choices: An Anthro, Scalie, Lizard, or Dragon
1.content:
You are gently rocked to consciousness by the stirrings of the train. The seats next to you are empty, as are the majority of other seats.

You head still hangs in the blurry space between sleep and wake. A hot blue sky leaves one side of your head hot and tingling, and you peel it away from the leather seat. The seats throughout the traincar face at strange angles. Although you sit facing forward against the right side, a small group of seats a few rows behind you face towards eachother. If it wasn't for the reflection in the glass at the front of the car, you wouldn't have had the energy to even notice. A colorful steel sign barrels down the side of the train bearing crossed feathers and the name "Tickleopolis."

That's right. Tickleopolis. The tickling capitol of the known world. Now that you're beginning to wake up, what the hell are you?
1.title: The Very Beginning

11.content:
You take a second to steady yourself. "Whew," you think, "When they said the transition would be disorienting, they weren't kidding."

Guess it's to be expected. Leaving the physical world for the toon realm was no small feat of science. It's hell on the body, but having a form that's efectively indestructable really widens the possibilities for an exciting vacation.

There are other advantages, too. Anonymity, for one. A custom designed toon body makes sure what happens in Tickleopolis stays in Tickleopolis.

Speaking of which, time to see how they did. You glance over at the mirror mounted beside the window.

You see...
11.title: Dancing to a different toon

111.content:
Your built like a linebacker (maybe one who's seen better days). Square-shouldered and thick around the middle, with thick legs and surprisingly wide feet. You'd be tough looking if it weren't for the blond-haired baby face staring back at you from the mirror.

The train begins to slow, then stops altogether. You step off and follow the signs for taxis.

At the taxi stand is strange white rabbit toon, looking hyperactive even just standing there. He lights up when he sees you, grabs your hand, and starts shaking it fast enough to practically dislocate your shoulder. You pull your hand away and notice your right arm is now conspicuously longer. For a second, you panic. Then you remember where you are. Waving your arm until it blurs, it warps back to "normal".

He introduces himself as Roger, says he works in film, asks you what you do, where you're from, and about 6 other questions without pausing to wait for answers (or for that matter, breathe).

"So, pal. First timer, hunh? I can always tell a first timer. They never know to hit the button."

Pulling an oversized mallet from nowhere, he obliterates a red button on the side of the taxi stand.

An bullet-shaped automated car pulls up. The top pops open and he front seat lifts up. It seems to seat one in back and one in front. It's also obvious that when the front seat comes down, the person in back's legs are trapped.

"Front or back, buddy?"
111.title: Taxi

choices: This little piggy went to market...
1111.content:
Roger jumps happily in back. The front seat slides down and back with a definite click. You jump in, the top closes, and the car begins gliding for the hotel. A timer lists 15 minutes until arrival.

"Nothing to do but wait," Roger says.

You see Roger's toes wiggling near your knees. The dark pink soles contrast sharply with the white furry tops and look screamingly sensitive.

"Hmmm," you think, "should I?"
1111.title: Nothing to do but wait

11111.content:
Who can resist...

Grabbing his big toe, you start. "This little piggy went to market..."

Silence. Hunh?

Looking in the rear view mirror, you can see Roger red-faced, both hands over his mouth.

Ah. Tough guy.

"This little piggy stayed home..." Grabbing his second toe, you add a little scratch to the wiggling.

A series of snorks and muffled snickers float up from behind you.

"This little piggy had roast beef..."

Snrrk-rrk-khh-khh-khh-snrk

"and this little piggy had..."

Wait. This little piggie only had three toes.

The tender feet wriggled in anticipation.

"um...this little piggy had 10 minutes left until we get to the hotel," you blurt, and attack both soles with gutso.

BAAAHAHAHAHAHA-HOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHOO-WAAHHAAHAAHAAA!

You settle in to a pattern of figure-8s on each foot. Your fingertips leave momentary wakes as they slide across the pillow-soft soles.

WOO-HOO! WOOHOOHOOHOOHAHAHAHA.

Gloved fists pound on the back of your seat. The cabin walls reverberate with toonish laughter.

You hardly hear the small ding announcing your arrival at the hotel. You pull a still giggling Roger from the back seat.

"Hey, you're pretty good at that, pal," he says, "Thanks for the giggle." Planting a smooch that covers half your face on your cheek, he darts off like a bullet.

A sign ahead lead two places.
11111.title: This little piggy...

111111.content:
The game room is far more bizarre than you could have imagined. Rather than pool tables and arcade games, the place looked more like some sort or superhero danger room.

In one corner, you see Mr. Incredible about to step into something that looks like a giant vise.

In another you see several toonish feet sticking out of a wall.
111111.title: Fun and games

1111111.content:
You walk over Mr. Incredible's way just before he steps into the machine. You introduce yourself and ask about the game.

"It's called the Hyena's Trap. Simple test of endurance really. You put your hands on the wall there and it starts closing in. When the walls get past the red lines (he gestures to lines on the floor at abaout shoulder width), it stops. Object is to hold out the longest time."

"Sounds simple enough," you say.

"Depends on how evil the guy playing Hyena is." He gestures towards the spot marked in front of the machine.

"Ah!" Of course, a fitting twist for this place.

"What'd'ya say. Give it a spin?"

"I doubt I could out-strongman a superhero."

"Nah," he says, "it's a smart machine. It will size you up and balance the hydraulics. Everyone gets a fair shake."
1111111.title: Hyena's Trap

11111111.content:
You climb into the machine and place your hands on the indicated spots on each wall. A series of lasers scan across your body, sizing up your potential. A few seconds later, a klaxxon goes off and the walls begin to close in. You brace yours shoulders and bring them to a halt with a grunt.

"Hrmph...not too bad," you remark.

"Not *yet*," grins Mr. Incredible, stepping in front of you.

"Oh, you wouldn't..."

"*I* wouldn't...but the villanous Hyena would!" With a look of pure evil, he begins poking your ample belly. "Looks like you could stand to lose a few pounds, chubby boy."

*grunt-snicker*

"I mean look at this flab," he says, grabing a handful of stomach and squeezing.

"heheHAAAH..c-c'mon now"

"And these love handles are shameful." Sliding his hands under your shirt, his fingers knead both your lats.

"NONONOHOHOHOHWAAAAAHHAHAHAHAHA"

Your try to twist, but the effort of holding back the closing walls has you locked in place. You're arms weaken as electric shocks fire along your waistline.

"Gitchie-gitchie-gitchie," taunts your tormentor.

"HEHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAA...STAAPPHAHAHAHA."

"And the less said about this beer gut the better." With that, his evil scratching fingers move forward around your waist, poking and kneading your underbelly. The mad tickling sensations build as he approaches that hotspot just over your belt buckle.

When the flurry of fingers grazes the area under your bellybutton, you lose what's left of your sanity. Your laughter is just breathless wheezing, and tears coat your face. You're so lost in the laughter you completely forget it's within your power to end it.

"No..." you wheeze between laughs, "Not thahahahat spohahahahat..."

Seconds later, your arms remember what your brain forgot and decide to give. You fall to the floor a giggling quivering mess.

Mr. Incredible congratulates you with a pat on the back that rattles your teeth. "Nice job, kid. You almost beat my score."
11111111.title: At the Mercy of the Hyena

111111111.content: you decide to try and find a new game to play. you see 2 games. the TICKLE ARENA and a chair looking game.
111111111.title: Stay in the game room

1111111111.content:
you drop dark place. there are 12 people. 6 with red glowing vests 6 with blue. each person has a laser that has the same color as there vests.

"welcome to the tickle arena." a voice booms "you will battle against each other in a game of wits and endurance. you start on opposite ends of the arena. each person has a laser. every time you get shot you get tickled for 30 seconds. once every team member quits you lose" the arena has hills walls and other obsticals to hide behind. if you reach to the other teams mega lazer. the the whole team will be tickled for 4 min. after your shoot 10 people or a mega lazer you need to go back to refill your lazer."

you walk down opposite sides as the other team. you appear by a huge wall that has a computer by it. the voice starts talking again

"in front of you is your main computer. this is where you refill. to your left is the main lazer. protect it from other the other team."

"now lets get ready"
"3"
"2"
"1"
"LAUGH!!!!"

choices: you make it with no complications
11111111111.content:
you decide to take the offensive. you decide to have two of your team members guard the main lazer. the other 4 members split into 2 groups. you and another kid head to the left side and the others head right. you figure the only way to get the other team to quit is to hit the main lazer at least twice in a row. you two head to the left side and hear people. you figure to get to the lazer you should try to stay under cover until you get closer to the lazer. the field is 800 meters long. you figure it will take you two six minutes to get to the other side while saying quiet. you two start heading to the other side.

"hey my name is tom" he says

"hey" you say

you two are reaching the other side and you go on top of a big hill. you two crouch down and you see the lazer. the hill is on the dark corner so you figure you are ok there. the lazer is in the left corner and there are 3 people guarding the lazer. you see the other 2 ppl on a similar hill on the other side. you speak through your walkie talkies they have you at the beginning.

"this is red team mobile 2 calling red team mobile 1." you speak into the walkie talkies.

"this is red team mobile 1" they answer

"we have 3 people guarding the lazer. we need to get them away from the lazer to get to it without being shot and losing are guns for 30 sec." you tell them

"well shoot at them and try to take 1 or 2 of them out" they say

"thats all i need" you say

they advance towards the lazer and shoot a bullet at 2 of the men. they instantly fall and start to laugh this is your chance. you two move in. tom takes the last one out and you run to the lazer. you shoot it and there whole team starts to laugh. you four both go to the hill.

"hey im out of bullets now. i need help getting back. there tickling will wear off before we can reach the refill my gun" you say

you see the other team on the ground get up. you four go into a tunnel that heads towards your refill station.
11111111111.title: attack

111111111112.content: It is then you remember that a team can take prisoners if they so choose. The three aimed their lazers at you. "Hands up and remove your shirt." One ordered. You smile and do as ordered. You are marched back to the enemy base where they lay you on a table and tie your wrists together above your head, then they tie your ankles together. They have your own tickle gun aimed at your belly so if you try to wiggle free you get tickled. You secretly hoped you'd get captured. The enemy decides to...
111111111112.title: you are met by 3 people

1111111111122.content:
All but one of the opposing team's players left to continue their attack, leaving you alone with one younger guy guarding you. He's standing against a wall in a cave like structure where captives are held, facing you and looking out through the hole of the cave, just in case anyone came in to try and rescue you (Hopefully not before you get a good tickle at least). After a couple minutes of just lying there you get bored and decide to tug at your restraints a little, just to see what would happen. Upon doing this your guard snapped out of a daydream and pointed the gun straight at you.

"Hey, don't you move or else you're gonna get it!" He shouted at you, his finger lightly pressing on the trigger.

"What are you gonna do," you replied sarcastically with a smirk on your face. "Are you gonna tickle me or something?"

With that remark, your enemy pulled the trigger and a laser beam shot at your belly, just to the right of your belly button. With this attack you started laughing hysterically.

HEHEHEHEHEHEHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOHHOHOHOHOHO!

After about 15 seconds of laughter, the tickling sensation started to wane, only until you felt another laser beam strike you, this time on your side. Your laughter picked up again and you continued to laugh wildly and squirm around in your restraints as your teen captor shot lasers all over your bare upperbody. It tickled too much, but you couldn't let the guy who kept tickling you with lasers know that. So, in order to keep up the tough-guy persona you took the tickling as best you could.

After a few minutes of lasers and what seemed like a lifetime of laughter, your captor finally faced the gun away from you.

He smiled at you evilly and said in a condescending manner, "Had enough, tough guy?"

You returned with a smile and a cocky cliche, "Is that the best you got?"

The guard seemed to get angry after hearing that, and rather than blasting you with a tickle laser again, he walked around to where your feet were restrained at the bottom of the table you were tied to. You struggled to lift your head to see what he was doing, even though you already had a pretty good guess. As he started to take your shoes off you feared for the worst. This might be some real tickle torture you weren't ready for.

As your big feet became bare, you wiggled your toes in anticipation, expecting either some fingers or a laser to start tickling you. But you were surprised when you saw your captor pick up your gun from earlier. The people that captured you must have left it with him, meaning double the tickle torture!

You watched with slight nerves as he placed both guns on a stone and pointed each one at both of your feet.

"I hope you´re ready to laugh, now!"

With that, the teen stuck 2 smaller rocks in the slot where the trigger was, forcing both guns to shoot a continuous stream of lasers at your defenseless bare feet. As soon as they touched your soles you flipped out.

NOOOOOOHOHOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! HEEEEEHEHEHEHEELP!! HAHAHAHAHAHAAA!

You felt an intense tickling sensation all over your feet. These lasers covered a lot of range, alost too much for you to handle.

As the lasers relentlessly tickled your bare feet, your captor walked over to your side and began wiggling his fingers on your chubby bare belly, causing you to jump and laugh even more.

NOHOHOHOOOOO! PLEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEASE! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

You laughed and laughed hysterically, even snorting a little on accident, as those damn lasers tickled your feet and your captor tickled your sides with his bare hands. You weren't sure how much more tickling you could take. Hopefully someone will save you soon.
1111111111122.title: Leave one person guarding you.

choices: Hurry and Get Out of There!
11111111111222.content:
As you were laughing hysterically from the tickle torture, you lost all sense of calm. You thrashed around as much as you possibly could in your tight restraints. Your teen captor was having too much fun tickling your belly and armpits, and there seemed to be no possible escape.

All of a sudden the tickling on your belly stopped and your captor fell to the ground. You were still laughing too hard from the tickling on your feet by the laser guns to notice what happened. Then, as quickly as your captor collapsed on the ground, the two lasers at your feet stopped. You breathed heavily, coming down from that tickle high that flew through your body. However you could still hear laughter.

You looked around frantically and saw one of your teammates from earlier shooting your captor with his tickle gun, forcing him to squirm around on the ground in endless giggles. Your teammate then let the lasers do their work and quickly released you from your restraints. You thanked him and then you looked at the teen who was once your ruthless captor, lying on the ground, still giggling from residual tickles from the gun.

Your teammate fixated his tickle gun on the ground-laden teen, and you both shared a look. It was time to make the next move quickly before anyone else pops in...
11111111111222.title: Someone comes to rescue you

The chair starts to move towards the door. it goes out the door and outside. it stops in front of the door. many people are there

"You have decided to play the tickle challenge"

an alarm starts going off

2 magical hands appear out of no where they go to your thighs and start to squeeze them.

the hands disappear and 2 feathers appear. they start to swipe your arms.

"hahahahaha someone help me"

two dogs come. 2 hands appear and put peanut butter on your feet. the dogs walk up and start to lick them.

"Hahahahahahahaha Please STOP" you screem "Someone HELP"

the dogs leave
111111111222.title: dog chow

111111112.content:
A quick stroll downtown takes you to the main drag. It's obvious from far off something big is going on, judging from all the noise and laughter.

You see a father and son with spikey hair and matching orange karate outfits heading excitedly towards the noise. The father is holding a festive urn brimming with candy in one hand, and his son's hand in the other. The kid is holding what looks like a decorative back-scratcher and pulling his father along in a hurried fashion.

"What's the big event?" You ask.

"Oh, hey, stranger," the father says cheerfully, "It's the Festival of Laughs. Biggest holiday in these parts."

Laughing, the kid starts running around you, tagging your belly with the back-scratcher.

"Hey! heh heh...haah heh heh...gah!"

"Candy! Candy! Candy!" He chants. You try to defend yourself, but the kid is lightning fast, landing quick tickles all around your torso.

"I don't think he has any candy, Gohan," says the father, "He's new here."

"Oh..." the jolts stop, "Sorry. mister."

"Heh, S'okay kid. I've gotten worse today."

With a smile and a wave, he goes back to towing his dad forward. "C'mon, dad. We're gonna miss the parade!"

"Okay okay. Hey stranger," he shouts back as his son pulls him into the crowd, "best stop at a festival booth if your going to the parade. You'll need it."
111111112.title: Festival of Laughs

1111111121.content:
Down the main avenue, the parade seem to be getting ready to start. The sidewalks are full of toons, human and otherwise, running around having fun.

Like the boy and his dad, everyone here seems to be toting a basket of candy or wielding a tickle toy. The latter are mostly kids, though a few adults can be seen with feathers and claws.

You spot the booth you were told about. A big blue genie sits inside it, popping around and helping several customers. He sees you coming an appears behind you with a puff of smoke.

"Now here's a man who needs to get into the spirit of the celebration," he says, pushing you forward the last 3 feet, "and have I got a deal for you!" Another pop and he's standing in front of you, dressed like a snake-oil salesman. "One day only, while supplies last, use only as directed, offer not valid in some parts of Canada and northern New Jersey, the one and only Festival of Laughter free ceremonial accoutrement!" Spouting 8 hands, he gestures to everthing in the booth at once, small fireworks launching behind his back.

"Um...'Kay"

"Oh," he says, deflated by your lack of enthusiasm, "New guy."

"No matter," he rallies, taking the form of a schoolteacher, "Allow me to educate."

"There are no spectators in this parade. Everyone's either a tickler or a target." He zips to the left side of the booth, "Ticklers get a tool, all your standard instruments of devious tickly destruction." He zips to the right "Ticklees get a candy dispenser. You stick your hands in these slots and hold it over your head. When someone tickles you enough, you flip this switch with you finger and a sweet jumps out. It's like being a pez dispenser, but easier on the neck."

"So what's it gonna be, fat boy?"
1111111121.title: Free gift

11111111211.content:
No way are you gonna to pass up the chance to tickle a whole parade full of people. And the candy just makes it win-win.

You scan the collection of tools available, they range from simple back-scratchers to colorful feathers on a stick. Your eyes settle on a wooden piece with a bird claw at one end and a stiff feather on the other. A seam runs across the center and a thin chain runs in a loop on either side of it.

"What's that one?" you ask.

"Oh ho, monsieur has excellent taste (POP). The TK-9000 model, with dual head action for multiple versatility. A master tickler's weapon, which with the flick of the wrist can become...", with a twist the two halves separate, connected by the length of chain, "Yuk-chucks! Hwaaaah!" With a Bruce Lee flurry of motion, the device whips around the genie's shoulders, tickling you, two other patrons, and himself before coming to a halt.

"Whoops, got away from me there."

Brandishing your new weapon, you set out to the parade grounds.
11111111211.title: Weapon of Choice

choices: No, Im too ticklish for that
111111112111.content:
You see Goku walking down the road and you immediately chase after him. He sees you coming for him, turns around and darts off in the other direction. After a thrilling chase you catch up to him and tackle him to the ground.

"Time for me to get some candy" you say as you start moving the feather around his exposed belly. He immediately starts cracking up.
"Nahahah plehehehese I don't have any candy left" he pleads.
"I don't believe you" you tell him as you use your other hand to start spider crawling in his armpits.
"No reehehehely plehehehehs stahahahahap"

Goku convinces you, and you climb off of him.

"What happened? The parade has barely started?"
"It was my son. He kept tickling me until I gave him all of my candy"
"Come on, you let your son take all of your candy" you tease him.
"Yea. And the booth wont give me any refills so now I'm stuck like this until the end of the parade"

"Candy, Candy, Candy!" you hear a group of kids screaming. You hear them getting louder and look down the road to see them running this way. You turn around to see Goku running down the road. "Good luck!" you yell at him as he runs from the group.

You walk around looking for people to tickle when you come across the booth again.

"Having a good time?" the man asks
"Yea, I'm having a blast" you tell him
"We are out of tickle tools so if you wanted to trade yours in for a dispenser we would greatly appreciate it"
"Well........"
111111112111.title: You come across Goku again

1111111121111.content:
You think this over for a minute. Although you don't like the idea of being tickled any more than you have to, it sounds like they are running out of candy and if that happens than nobody will have fun. You decide to bite the bullet and hand over your weapon. "Ill do it" you tell the man.

"Thats the spirit" the man says as he takes your weapon from you. He orders you to place your hands above your head and you follow his orders. He walks around the counter holding what appears to be a giant Pez dispenser and slips is over your hands. The dispenser slides down till it almost reaches your head and you can just feel what you assume is the dispenser lever on your hands. The man tightens the straps and you are all set to go.

You try and move your arms around but the dispenser greatly limits your movement. With your arms pinned together, your hands cant be pulled down. You feel a cold breeze cross your stomach alerting you to the fact that your shirt is pulled up, exposing most of your belly, and you start to wonder if this was a good idea of not. Well it is too late now as the man runs down the road chasing after another potential client.

You walk around for a while until you hear a voice behind you. Turning around you see.........
1111111121111.title: I would love too

111111112112.content:
Anywhere else in the world, the sight of a giant blue-grey bear in a flight jacket would be disconcerting. But right now, that round plushie belly looked like the perfect testing grounds for your TK-9000.

You walk up behind Baloo and pat him on the back. "Hey, poppa bear, spare some candy?"

"Hey, buddy," the bear says amiably, "Oh I'd like ta help ya, but Kit got me to fork over half my supply before I even got here. I gotta make this stuff last, y'know."

"Oh I'm sure you can spare *one* piece, for a buddy."
You punctuate the word "one" with a fingertip lightly twirled in the center of his stomach.

"Gnheh...naw now...heh-heh-hah...now you're ticklin'...heh-hah-ha-ha...can't stand the ticklin'..."

Squirming, the giant bear stumbles backwards and lands on his backside. With his arms stuck above his head and his little legs kicikng uselessly, his plump tummy is an open target.

The claw end of your tickler starts making laps through his belly fur. Down the side, over the lats, up the center to dance over his gut, then down the other side to start again.

"heh-heh-hah-HAH-HA-HA-HAAAH-ho-ho-heh-heh-haw"

Rocking back and forth like a turtle on it's back, Baloo laughed like he was born to do it. His belly stretched and jiggled under your attack.

"More! Mo-hohohore...heh-heh-heh-HEH-HAH-HAH-heh-heh-heh."

He's enjoying this. Well, you're not going to get and candy this way. Time to go for the kill.

Bracing both hands against his belly, you draw in a deep breath melodramatically.

"No...heh-HA-HA...no-no..."

You bury your lips in the blue fur and lay a giant raspberry dead center of his tummy.

BRRRRRRRRAAPPPPPPPPTTTHHHH!

"HEH-HEH-HAAWW-HA-HA-HAHAHAHAHAHAWW..."

You draw back for another breath, your fingers wriggling in his sides as you do.

BRRRRRRRRAAPPPPPPPPHHHHHHTTTTTTTTHHHHHHH!

"HAHAHAWHOOOHOOOHOOHAHAHAHAHAHA..."

You draw back again.

"ALL RI-HIGHT! HEH..heh-heh-heh...All right alrea-heh-dy...whew." With a click, a candy treat pops out onto his heaving stomach.

You sntach up the sweet and give Baloo a friendly pat on the belly. "Thanks, poppa bear."

"Heh...you're OK, buddy," he says, "Now help an old bear to his feet, 'kay."

You're about to reach out a hand to lift him up when three young ducks armed with ticklers scurry up. "Look, it's Unca' Baloo!"

Baloo waves away your hand with a wink. Smiling you wander off to the sound of deep helpless chuckles.
111111112112.title: Bear belly

11111111212.content:
Getting into the spirit of the occasion, you opt for a candy dispenser.

"I knew it," says genie, poking your belly for effect, "when I saw you walking up I thought 'now there's a man who's a born pinata'."

"Ha ha," you say sarcastically. You put your hands over your head, causing your shirt to hike up. The cold air makes your belly feel very vulnerable.

He slaps the jar on your hands before you can reconsider and tightens the wrists. You can feel the dispenser button under your index finger. You give it a test push and a chocolate in festive green cellophane falls to the ground.

"You're all set, chubsy." He starts pushing you towards the parade. "Just one more thing. No refills, so make that candy last. I wouldn't want to be you if a bunch of rugrats hopped up on sugar find you with and empty jar. They'll think your holding out."

"Wait...what?!?!" But you turn and he's gone. You tug at your hands and realize he never told you how to get out of this thing, either. Crap.

You barely make it a few feet when you hear a familiar voice.

"Candy! Candy! Candy!" Gohan scurries up in front of you, eyeing the urn over your head. "Aha, you're fair game now."

"Heh, OK, kid. But be gentle, you're my first."

Sliding his backscratcher inside your shirt, he makes contact with your ribs. "Gaahk...skrrnt...cold!"

"Heh, you're funny mister."

The claw touches down again, this time making a little half circle over your rib cage. "Gnnkkhaah-ha-hehe." You want to bring your arms down, but the wrist straps on the urn make that inconvenient at best. Besides, you're kinda having fun.

The third hit was a solid scratching, starting at your lowest rib and heading north. "Aaaahahahahoho-kay-okay-okay-okayeee!" You press the button and drop a treat just before he hits your armpit. Whew, close.

Gohan grabs up the sweet with and air of victory.

"You're never gonna last if your give up that easily," says a voice from behind you. You turn to see the Gohan's dad, relieved to find him trussed up just like you. You need a break before the next one.

"Oh, hi, um..."

"Goku," he offers.

"I dunno," you say, "he was tough."

"They get a lot tougher. You have to make them work for it a little. It's more fun that way, too."

A raspy voice comes from over your shoulder. "I'm glad you feel that way, little man." You turn around and stare dumbfounded into the torso of a giant caterpillar. "Cause we've got a score to settle."

11111112.content:
Mr. Incredible hops into the machine, takes a few deep breaths, and places his hands on the walls. A buzzer sounds and the sound of machinery meeting muscle fills the area.

After a second, a bit of belly sticks out of the waistline of Incredible's uniform from the strain. That's when you remember your role.

Wiggling your fingers menacingly in front of the musclular man's gut has an immediate reaction. He tries to pull his midsection back, but loses his position of strength and the wall slides an inch. Recovering, he braces his legs wide, knowing he has nowhere to go.

"Cootch-Cootch-Cootch" You're fingers make contact with his stomach. He grits his teeth and begins to turn red from the combined efforts.

"Big tough superhero have a tender belly?" Your fingers land again, sliding along one side, throwing him off balance. The wall gains another inch.

"No one resists the clutches of the HYENA!" You bing both hands down on his sides, fingers splayed, and vibrate your hands. Laughter erupts from the hero as ten quivering nerve endings light up at once. His arms shake and go soft for a second, then stiffen again.

You're impressed at his resolve. A real hero. You pause the assualt, let him gasp for air, then hit him again.

You glance at the timer and see he's just 10 seconds from the record. Well, better make him earn it.

Milking the role now, you cackle, "All right, Incredible. Time to end this. Let's see if those armpits can handle some attention."

"No...Ohno...No!"

Your hands come up slowly, one finger on each extended and wiggling. His stare goes from hand to hand, wishing he had heat vision or super breath. Anything to stop them from landing.

They landed.

Your fingers circl in the wide pits, made slick from the satiny super suit. Huge gales of laugher pour from the mighty lungs. His arms shudder as he fights the screaming urge to bring them down. Up, down, around. The sensations of two fingertips fill his reality, until finally, he collapses.

When he finally stopped laughing, he looked at the clock. Beat the record by 3 seconds.

1112.content:
Looking down at the 18 EEE's you've been drawn with, you wonder if this is a bad idea. Oh well, when in Rome...

You hop into the back seat, which is relclined like an EZ chair. The front seat descends, then slides back. You're feet stick out from under the armrests of the seat in front of you. Roger hops in. The top closes and the auto-cab glides away.

"Hotel, my good man," Roger says to no one in particular, "And take the scenic route."

A sound of fumbling comes from the front of the car, as Roger hunts through his pockets. After extracting and discarding a jackhammer, a swordfish, and plunger, he finally extracts two small items with an air of success.

"So, pal. Since you're new here, no time like the present to get you acquainted with the local pastimes."

You feel the oddest sensation as Roger sticks the tuna can key in the bottom of your boot and rolls away the sole. The cold air hits your socked foot, and you suddenly feel very, very vulnerable.

With a grandiose flourish, Roger announces, "Welcome to Ticklopolis, big boy!" He pulls off your sock with a swoosh and tosses it like a streamer. "Or as the natives say, koothcie-kootchie-koo.."

The feather hits your sole like a bolt of lightning.

"WOO-ohno-nonoHOHOHOHAHAHAHAHAAAAAHAHAHAHA"

The feather's tip dances around the ball of your foot, slides down to the arch, makes a couple of loops, then travels down to the heel.

"HEEHEEHEEHEEHAHAHAHA...hold-up-hold-ahHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"

You try to slide your hand between the side of the seat and the wall, but it doesn't come close to fitting. Wielding the tickle tool like a sword, Roger slashes at your enormous sole, making a triumphant Z across the arch.

You grab the sides of the seat back and shake, but it's fixed sturdily in place. That's when hit hits your toes.

Five rapid fire sensations shoot to your mind, all with the same message: Laugh! Laugh for all you're worth!

"BAAAHAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAAA...NOT-THA-HAHAHAHAHAHOHOOHOO"

You sink into the seat, helpless. You're muscles aren't yours to control anymore. You're making sounds only dogs can hear.

"Ding!"

You're dimly aware of the tickling stopping, and a gorilla dressed like a bell hop carrying you to your room. You wake the next day...
1112.title: Joy ride

choices: I woke up sometime later, still tied to the bed.
I woke up sometime later, no longer tied hand and foot.
11121.content:
It appears that my wrists are bound to the upper corners of the mattress, and my ankles are bound to the lower corners. I'm uncovered, my feet are bare, and my t-shirt is gone, though I'm still wearing my shorts.

I'm about to call for help when there's a knock at the door. Thank heavens! "Come in!" I shout.

The door opens just a bit. A white gloved hand appears. "Come in!" I shout again, anxious to get out of my predicament.

The door opens slowly. A clown appears--the silliest looking clown I've ever seen, with a grinning mouth so wide it looks like he stuck a coathanger in it. He has a red suit, cascading clumps of orange hair, and big glassy eyes that have...a strange look to them.

"Help me get loose!" I tell him.

He looks around, as if he doesn't know who spoke. He seems to be looking for any other exits from the room. Finding none, he leans back against the door, shutting it.

"Ahhhh!" he says, his glassy eyes fixed on me. "Just the person I was looking for!"

"But you don't even know who I am!"

"Wellll...I know that you can't move. You're all tied down! And there's something else I know...."

"Well, I know you'd better cut me loose!"

He waves one of his white gloved fingers at me. "Tut tut tut." As I watch, something strange happens. His finger grows and grows...till it's as long as his arm, snaking through the air. "Oh, my goodness!" he says, watching his winding, twisting finger as if he's never seen anything so strange either! "Will you look at that! It's a good thing the rest of my fingers can't do that...!"

No sooner has he spoken than the rest of his fingers begin to grow. They writhe and twist through the air, all around the bed.

"Well, it's a good thing I came here!" he says. "And it's a good thing that I know what I know!"

"There's nothing good about this," I tell him, watching as those creeping fingers swoop high, then low, nearly touching me! "What is it that you know? Tell me!"

"Welll....I know that you're...TICKLISH!"

Before I can say another word those fingertips start closing in from all directions. Two of them settle against the soles of my feet, just lightly touching down. Two of them crawl into my armpits. Two of them settle on my upper ribs, and two on my lower ribs. Two of them press against my sides. And two more press against my belly, on either side of my belly button.

What?? That's twelve fingers! Damn these toons, you never know how many fingers they'll come up with! I guess I'm lucky he doesn't have twenty fingers...but then I'm not so lucky, not lucky at all...because those fingers start to...move...!

"Oh yes my friend, I know you're just as TICKLISH as can be! TICKLE, TICKLE...."

As if stirred to action by his voice, the fingertips press against me in all those ticklish spots, and begin to move faster, and faster.... The tickling sensations are unbelievable! I try to hold my breath, to keep from laughing, but it's no use. I let go a long stream of hysterical giggles.

"See? You're hysterical already! And it's only going to get WORSE!"

This is too much, having my feet, ribs, armpits, belly, and sides all tickled at the same time! The tickling sensations fill my head, and all I can do is laugh...laugh harder than I've ever laughed in my life!

"Don't think you're going to get out of this anytime SOON, my friend. I've never seen anyone as ticklish as you, and I'm having too much fun to EVER stop!"

Oh, no! If only I could stop laughing for just a second, I'd beg for mercy! My entire ticklish body is being stroked, poked, and tweaked...and the soles of my extra wide feet are being horribly abused!

"Now," the clown said, "here's another surprise for you. I read your thoughts a few minutes ago, when you were thinking how lucky you were that I didn't have twenty fingers. And you were right, I don't have twenty fingers!"

Even as he spoke, more of the devilish white tendrils snaked through the air toward my helpless body.

"No...I actually have...A HUNDRED FINGERS!"

And they all attacked! If I'd thought I was being tickled before, that was nothing compared to this! I was covered with wriggling, prodding fingers, digging into my ribs, twisting into my armpits, and mercilessly poking my belly! As for my feet, they were in worse trouble than ever! Those mad fingers were not only scrabbling against my soles, they were also squeezing my toes, and slipping in between my toes...!

I had never been tickled like this before! Time seemed to stop, as my hysterical laughter turned to helpless panting. I couldn't even struggle against the bonds anymore, I had to...just...give in...to the madness of being tickled to death!

How long it took I would never know, but at last I sank into unconsciousness....
11121.title: The Clown Attacks

Reluctantly, you drop back to a casual swiping with the soft end of the feather. He pulls one foot out and you slide his sandals through the hole. 112.content:
You're staring into the face of young man, 17 maybe 18. You have black wispy hair in sloppy spikes, with a slash of purple near the crest. Smooth skin, dark eyes, a small onyx piercing over one brow. A hint of hair decorates your chin, framing an off-center smile that seems to say "I dare you."

Torn jeans hang low on your hips. A snug black shirt makes it most of the way to meet them, but falls inches short of the mark. In between, the bottom half of a tight six-pack ripples invitingly. The tattoo of an ornate feather dances just left of center on your waistline.

Your feet are bare. Smooth on top, with pale velvety soles that turn pink at the edges. You flex them and watch wrinkles appear and vanish, like someone throwing pebbles into the surface of a tranquil lake.

You take a moment to move around and get the hang of your new form. As you stretch and twist, the feel of cloth and air against your skin makes you strikingly aware of how sensitive your are. You're nerve endings are alive like never before. Considering where you're headed, the implications both worry and excite you.

You sit and rub your soles against the seat across from you. The suede feels soft and slightly tickly. You're amazed at how easy it is to get lost in the sensation. The train around you seems to melt away. There's just you, your feet, and the smooth, feathery material. Mmmmmm...

Your toe brushes against something slightly scratchy. You half open your eyes and notice a cylindrical shape on the opposite seat. You prod it with your big toe. It's lightweight and rustles. Paper. Begrudgingly, you pull yourself from your reverie.

You're not sure how you didn't notice the scroll before, what with the big red ribbon and all. You notice a wax seal on it with a marking "NC-17". Peculiar.

You reach out to pick up the parchment...
112.title: Important Decisions

1121.content:
Twelve suns, twelve moons to mark the time.
Twelve times the pledge. Twelve times the sign.
Twelve trials beneath the foreign stars.
Twelve times you fail, then you are ours.

The last word jumps from the page and burns in your brain. Again, the train melts away. Your other senses fall dormant, leaving you only a grotesquely magnified charicature of touch. Your skin lights up, every nerve working beyond capacity. You feel every wrinkle of your clothes, every wisp of air. The conours of the carpet under your feet seem large as mountains. Your own heartbeat is like shotgun blasts to your chest.

The insane stimuli merge into noise, a single, cacophanous, unbearable sensation. Then, from the chaos, distinct tactile shapes form. Hands, or something like them. Dozens of hands. Small, large, smooth, clawed; some caressing, some stroking erotically, still others scratching and kneading ticklish places.

You collapse to a fetal position. Laughing, moaning, crying. Your hands try futilely to block the nonexistant touches. Your mind tries desperately to assimilate them, wants to experience them, to have them all, but can't take it all in.

Stop, stop! Please, I'll do anything!

Silence.

The sudden relative absense of sensation is like rapid decompression. For a minute, you feel numb. When your mind readjusts to normal levels of information, you become aware of a strange, light burning on your chest.

Facing the mirror again, you pull up your shirt to reveal a tattoo over your heart. A clock face, devoid of numbers, with the hands roughly at mignight. As you watch, the roman numeral "I" sears into place.

Twelve times the pledge. Twelve times the sign.

Whatever game you're playing, you just lost Round One.

113111.content:
You lay on the ground helpless, awaiting a toon to come to your rescue. You watch the people around you. Many people see your predicament, however nobody seems to care. You start to wonder if you should be grateful that everyone is ignoring you. You dodged a bullet with that kid, and who knows what torment a full blown adult could put you through. And for all you know, this is something that wears off after a while.

You eventually see someone walking down the hallway of the train. She makes eye contact with you, then she starts walking in your direction. The unknown woman has tiny black fairy wings sprouting out of her back. With her long, straight black hair, you have to admit that she is fairly attractive. She is fairly short, standing only a couple inches over 5 feet, and is wearing a dark blue, skin tight tank that only barely covers her chest. She also wears a pair of black athletic shorts.

She has a mischievous grin on her face that tells you that she is not going to be super helpful, and that you should probably be worried. Time seems to slow as you anticipate what her arrival will mean for you. When she finally reaches you, she kneels down over your waist, looking you in the eyes. She starts speaking.

"Well well well, what do we have here? A trapped hero? And a good looking one at that" she giggle to herself "This is my lucky day. But I should probably introduce myself. My name is Faerydae, and I am a fairy. I have to warn you though, I am not one of those goody two shoes fairies you see in the movies. Some people call me evil, however I prefer to think of it as me just having a good time"

You almost leap out of your skin, well you would have if you could move, as Faerydae unexpectedly digs her fingers into your sides. This sudden attack leaves you off guard and you howl with laughter. "Aww is our hero a little but ticklish? Thats not good for you" she teases as she starts raking her fingers across your ribs. You try with all your might to defend yourself, but the pills are still in effect, you cant even move a muscle. She bends over and starts blowing raspberries on your belly button and you go mad! Your laughter gets higher and higher until you cant even hear it anymore.

After what feels like an eternity of this torment, you manage to move your arm. You push her off with your immense strength, and she floats before your, flapping her wings. "Well looks like the pills are wearing off so its time for me to get out of here. We should do this again sometime!" she says before turning around, and flying to another train car. Well it is clear now, Tickleopolis has a new villain in town, and there is only one hero who can stop her. You don't know exactly what her intentions are, but you know they can't be good. The pills finally wear off and you get off the ground.
113111.title: A super villain approaches

1131111.content:
As soon as you stand up, you rush to where you saw the fairy leave. Your muscles are still stiff, but a hero can't be bothered by such petty things.

As soon as you enter the train car, you notice it's significantly more busy than the other one. Despite this, it doesn't take long to spot Faerydae, floating above the crowd on the other side of the car. She's gazing through the window, taking a sip from an opaque, midnight blue glass bottle every then and again.
"Doesn't seem to know I'm here", you think to yourself, somewhat relieved. You just ran here on a heroic impulse - you don't exactly have a plan of action ready.

Hidden in the crowd, you take a second to quickly decide what to do. Your upper body is still tingling slightly from the fairy's attack, tempting you to give her a taste of her own medicine.
On the other hand - who knows what she may be plotting? Some part of you thinks you should stay discreet for now to try and find out.
1131111.title: Persue Faerydae

1131112.content:
Faerydae is a villain who needs to be stopped, however she is long gone, and how much trouble can she really do. You are in a toon world where no one can be harmed, so at best she will be a nuisance to the public. You are sure you will meet up with her again, and you will stop her then. You jump off of the train and are standing in a large train station.

You look around and see multiple trains unloading and loading people. The different tracks all go through tunnels that appear to head to different dimensions. Getting off of the trains are toons of all shapes and sizes. You see toons that look like humans, animals, anthros, and creatures that you would have never imagined existed. It appears that you can literally be anything you want here in Tickleopolis.

You walk up to a check in point and a large, tough looking guard starts talking to you. Tickleopolis is the inter-dimensional hub for all the dimensions of the universe so security is really tight. "Passport Please" he tells you. He views the passport and confirms that you are allowed to enter the toon world. "It says here that you are a human. Please remember that according to inter-dimensional code 1554, you may not bring any human artifacts into this dimension, and you may not bring anything back from here. If you attempt to violate this law, you will be dealt with severely. Also remember that while in Tickleopolis you will be held to their laws and if you break a law, you will be dealt with by the Tickleopolis legal system. Now please stand still"

The guard scans you to ensure that you are who you say you are and that you are not attempting to smuggle anything into this world. He then sends you on your way and you are now officially in Tickleopolis. You walk through the double doors of the train station and are blinded by the bright sun shining in the sky. You see a floating green arrow pointing to a line of people with the word Cab hovering above it. You enter the line and wait.

The line moves fairly quickly and before you know it you are sitting in the front. A bullet shaped car comes speeding up to you and stops in front of you. A door opens and you climb in. You see there are two seats in the car, one in the front and one in the back. You climb in the back seat and the front seat slides back, pinning your feet underneath it.

In the front of the car climbs a woman with a long ponytail and a blue dress. "Hey mind if I share a car, there all going to the same place anyways" the woman asks. You tell here that it is fine with you and you introduces yourself. "My name is Else. It is a pleasure to meet you" You and Elsa talk for a while while the automated cab car drives you to the city.

It does not take long for Elsa to notice your feet sticking out of the bottom of her seat. "Hey, get your feet off of my side of the cab" she teases. You tell her that they are pinned under the cab and not going anywhere. "Oh really?" She says looking back at you. She has a mischievous grin on her face that sends shivers down your spine. You try with all your might to pull your feet back but they are stuck tight.

She starts messing around with your feet and before you know it she is holding both of your shoes in her hand. "Ops your shoes fell off" she teases she throws them aside and then you feel her fingernails rake across your feet. You bite your lip to try and prevent yourself from laughing. She rakes her fingers across them again and again.

"Are you ok?" she teases while raking her nails across your sensitive sole "You face is scrunched up. You look like you are about to explode!" If you open your mouth there is no stopping the laughter from escaping your so you ignore her question. Unfortunately she starts doing the same thing with her other hand and it is to much. You start giggling.

"Whats the matter? Are you ticklish? No that cant be only little girls are ticklish!" she teases you "And there is no way that a big strong man like you could be brought down by just a couple fingernails brushing against his feet" She increases her intensity and starts spider crawling across the arches of your feet. Your giggles turn to full blown laughter and you can tell by the look on her face that she is enjoying herself

"Wow you are ticklish! I can't believe what a little baby you are!" she teases you. "Well since it is your first time in Tickleopolis I will let you off easy, but don't expect any mercy next time we meet" she tells you. She stops your torment and you two arrive at the hotel. She helps you climb out of the cab and the two of you enter the hotel together.

After checking in, you both enter the elevator which shoots you up to the 119th floor. You walk down a long hallway of seemingly identical hotel rooms and arrive at yours. It turns out that Elsa is going to be your neighbor, along with her younger sister Anna.

"Hey we should hang out together sometime" she tells you "I would love to see where else you are ticklish" she teases. You tell her you would love to hang out sometime. After all, you want some payback! You enter your room and look around. You have a large room with a double bed in it. You also have a balcony, a bathroom, and a kitchen.
1131112.title: Get off theTrain

choices: You are tied to the bed
11311121.content: You still feel dizzy from your transformation and decided to take a nap. You strip down to your underwear and lay down on top of your bed. Before you know it, you are fast asleep. You have a nice, long sleep and when you awaken you feel refreshed. You go to get up and........
11311121.title: Take a nap

113111211.content: You cant get up. Looking up you notice that your hands and feet are tied to the posts of the bed, stretching you tight. You look around the room trying to figure out what in the world is going on. You then notice something you did not notice before. You see a shadow moving around in your bathroom. You can not tell who it is, but you see there reflection on the wall. Eventually, the person steps out and you see........
113111211.title: You are tied to the bed

1131112111.content:
You see a brown haired woman with long pigtails walk out of your bathroom. She notices you and walks over. "Its about time you wake up! I thought you were going to sleep all day. Well here in Tickleopolis the day never ends, but you get what I mean" she says. "My sister told me that she met you today. By the way you should consider yourself lucky. What you saw today was Elsa restraining herself. Normally she would have tickled you for hours! And she is good at it too! Anyways I just thought I would come over and introduce myself. My name is Anna"

"Hi Anna" you say after introducing yourself. "Now do you think you could possibly untie me? I'm not really sure how this happened" You are slightly embarrassed that Anna found you in this situation, and a little nervous. If Anna is anything like her sister you are in big big trouble. Anna looks you over, still grinning. At first you thought she was happy to find you like this, but something tells you that she just always smiles.

"Oh I know how it happened!" she says excitedly "I walked in here and you were passed out. So I thought I would have a little bit of fun! You are a really heavy sleeper by the way. I thought for sure you would wake up when I was tying up your arms and legs. Anyways I will not untie you. At least not yet. I think we need to have a little bit of fun first!"

"What!" you think to yourself. This random girl tied you up while you were sleeping! You pull at your bonds now realizing how much trouble you are in but they are tied tight. You are not going anywhere. Anna approaches you slowly and then climbs onto the bed, straddling your waist. "Now my sister tells you your feet are pretty ticklish. But usually I find that men are more ticklish on there upper body" she says hovering her fingers over your body.

She then pounces, digging her fingers into the hollows of your armpits. You cant even fight it and you immediately burst out into laughter. "I knew you were ticklish there!" Anna excitedly shouts as she digs her fingers deeper into your armpits. You thrash and buck your hips trying to throw her off of you, however she is not phased.

"Wow this is just like riding a bull" Anna laughs "Faster, Faster, Faster!" she taunts as she moves her hands down and starts spider tickling your abs. This causes you to buck faster and faster trying with all of your might to get her off of you. Unfortunately she seems to be enjoying your reaction and just starts riding you like a bull. You even manage to make her air born a couple of times, but she just lands back on top of you, never ceasing the attack.

You laughter is slowly sapping your energy and you eventually lose the ability to fight back and you just lay there, laughing as she glides her fingers up and down the sides of your stomach. After what seems like an eternity of tickling she ceases her tickling and climbs off of you. "Well that was a blast!" she tells you "But I think I am done. Tickling is fun and all but I am not as merciless as my older sister. Well now its time to......."
1131112111.title: A brown haired girl

11311121111.content:
"Well that was a lot of fun!" Anna says happily "But I think I have put you through enough torment for one day" she unties your feet and wrists before running out of the room. Exhausted, you lay on your bed for a moment panting. Eventually you muster up the strength and get up off of your bed. "Note to self. Next time lock your door before sleeping" you think to yourself.

You walk around your room looking around. You notice a note on your bedside table that you did not see before. You decide to......
11311121111.title: Set you free

11311121112.content:
"It is time for me to leave" she says climbing off of you and walking to the door. "This has been a lot of fun though!" You are still pretty dazed and she is almost out of the door when you realize that she has no intention of freeing you before she leaves. "Wait you cant just leave me here like this!" yell at her. She just turns around and smiles at you. "Of course I can! But don't worry! I will let Elsa know you are over here" she says

"Wait no! She will tickle me. Please let me go!" you plead with Anna. The grin on her face gets even bigger. "Yea she probably will. But I promised her I would leave you here. She really wanted another chance to tickle you! I would hate to be in your shoes right now! Anyways have fun" she says before exiting the room. You lay there trying with all of your might to escape before Elsa comes in!"
11311121112.title: Leave

11313.content:
The little boy has a devious smile on his face, which of course you see, as he slowly wiggles his small fingers. Lowering his hand slowly to stop where it hovered right over your rock hard abs covered by a skin tight black shirt. He keeps his hand there hovering over your abs, still wiggling his fingers, filling you with suspense for when he finally does STRIKE
Finally, to your dismay, the little boy decides he’s waited long enough and DIVES RIGHT IN. You jolt, or at least you would have if you could move, as you feel the boy use his small yet fast and firm hand on your defined abs. The small hand quickly squeezing your sides, poking your belling button, dipping into it every now and then, and prodding your rib cage.
You were sent into hysterical madness, screaming out in ticklish agony, flailing your arms and legs, your chest heaving up and down from your loud laughter. At least that’s what you wanted to do, but in reality your tall muscular body stayed still in the same position. The best you could really do is occasionally flex your abs and let out a small giggle. This did very little to help though as it only enticed your young attacker even more, tempting him into an excited fury on your torso.
Even though you hadn’t moved an inch your body felt like it was running marathon, the ticklish sensations were intensified by your sense of helplessness and inability to predict the small child’s next move. Your body quivered as the little boy used just one hand to DESTROY you abdomen. Squeezing hard here and there, squeezing softly somewhere else. Using his nails to scratch through the thin, tight fabric that gave you little protection. Wiggling his fingers in and out of your navel the best that he could, and this was all with just one of his small hands.
The effect of the pills were still going strong, leaving you completely vulnerable. Although your body couldn’t move, it could still produce sweat, and oh boy did you sweat. Your hair was matted to your forehead by sweat, stains began to form in your shirt at your armpits and in between your large, muscular pecs. Not to mention your abs, which the little boy seemed be obsessed with as he went to town on them, were DRENCHED. The thin black fabric sticking even tighter to your torso than before, displaying your impressive eight pack.
The little boy noticed this and decided that he’d give you a second to relax, well kinda. He had stopped the annihilation of your abdomen and decided to instead lightly trace your hypnotic eight pack with his small fingers, not once stopping the ticklish feelings. He stared at you in awe as he circled around your big muscles, occasionally giving them a squeeze or a quick scratch. To have gotten to seen such a large and handsome hero who he quickly developed an admiration for was a dream come true for the boy, but then to get to tickle said hero to his hearts content, now that was a fantasy which he loved. Unfortunately for you this state of vulnerability and intense tummy tickles, WAS A NIGHTMARE.
For the first time since he had found your paralyzed body, his face came into your view and he spoke to you.
“I can’t wait to have more fun with you!!” The little boy said while having a big, genuine smile of pure happiness on his adorable little face. You realize that this was the first time you had really seen the young boy and the first he had said anything. Unless you count giggling while sending you into hysterics as saying something.
11313.title: Stomach

1132.content:
You decide that taking random pills you found inside of an armrest is ill advised so you decide to walk it off. You throw the book inside of your pocket. "Wait a minute. That book should not be able to fit in my pocket" you think to yourself. You open your pocket and take a look. All you can see is darkness and it appears to be bottomless. "Weird" you think to yourself.

You stand up and walk around the cars of the train. Each car you pass is full of other people, some muscular like you, some who appear to be skinny and weak, and many others. Most of the people are sleeping however some are walking around the cabin like you are. You are about to turn around to head back to your seat when something catches your eye.

On the ground you see a tall, muscular girl. She has long curly black hair that goes past her shoulders. Although she is a lot skinnier than you are, she is very toned and you don't doubt that she is just as strong. At first you think she is sleeping but then you notice here eyes are wide open. You walk over to here. You look around and see that her armrest is open and the pills are gone.

"Good thing I did not take those pills" you think to yourself. You then look back. She is wearing a small tank top that barely covers her breasts and very short shorts. She appears to be paralyzed with her arms over her head and her feet out in front of her. You see that her belly is exposed and you cant help yourself. You kneel down and start tickling her belly. You almost jump out of your skin when she starts screaming..

"NO!!!!!! Don't!!!!" she cries out
"Sorry could not help myself"
"Can you please help me. I cant move"
"Yea just hold on a minute"

You head back to her seat and open up the other armrest. In the armrest is another pill with the letter A on it. Assuming it stands for antidote you grab it and place it in her mouth. She soon starts to move and is able to stand up. She thanks you for freeing her.

"My name is Amber" She tells you.
"Nice to meet you"

The train comes to a halt and you get off. There is a line for taxis and you and Amber talk while waiting to get in one. It turns out this is her first time to Tickleopolis and she has no clue what to expect. A bullet shaped car comes speeding up and opens up. There is no driver, just two seats, one in the front and one in the back. Which seat do you get in?
1132.title: Walk it off

11321.content:
The front seat of the car lifts up allowing access to the back seat. "After you.", you say to Amber holding out your hand. She climbs into the bullet shaped car and crawls into the back seat and sticks her legs out in front of her. After she gets situated, you return the seat to its normal position, making sure not to crush Amber's legs, which pins them to the ground. You noticed that the seat is a little different than your average seat. It is slightly raised and there seems to be extra room underneath for the legs of the passenger behind.

The door to the car slides shut. Before you lay back in your seat, you are about to ask Amber if she has enough room, when you turn around and see that the back seat reclines as well and that she has taken full advantage of this luxury.

"Hey, why are we not moving?", you ask, confused.
"Shoes and socks must not be worn inside the taxi." announces a computerized voice say.
You take off your shoes and socks, placing them on the floor in front of you.
"Ugh! I forgot! But I cant reach my feet.", you hear Amber say, "Would you be a gentleman it do it for me?"
"Sure, no problem.", you respond politely.

You remove her left shoe and slide it off her foot, followed by the left sock. You see her toes wriggle as she feels the cool air hit her foot. You do the same thing to her right shoe and sock. She smiles from the back seat, "It feels so good to finally get them off, I've been traveling for hours."
"Destination Hotel", you hear the voice say, "We should arrive in approximately 20 minutes."

You look in the side view mirror and see that Amber has already let her head tilt to the side and closed her eyes.She is obviously worn out from all the traveling she has been through. You think to yourself that, that may not be such a bad idea. It seems she is new to this area as well. Maybe you could make a friend. However, just as you were about to fall asleep you think "she IS in a precarious position at the moment..", and who knows if she would be so kind to you if the tables were turned...
11321.title: Front Seat

You turn your head and notice a restaurant down the street. You go in to ...
11321112.title: Go to the pool

choices: visit one of Tickleopoluses other attractions.
113211121.content:
As you quickly exit the hotel lobby you feel the warm summer breeze on your bare chest and stomach. At that moment your realize that in your haste to flee from the strange creatures that occupied the swimming pool you forgot your clothes." I'm not going back in there anytime soon" you told yourself, your foot still tingling from the vicious tickling you had just endured. You stand there lost in thought, considering what you want to do. Suddenly your concentration is broken by someone calling your name. As you look up, you see a black limo and its driver, a greenish blue octopus with 9 tentacles, and wearing a black cap. " How about a tour of the city? Complements of the Hotel." The driver asks politely, apparently not bothered by the fact that you are shirtless and barefoot. As you take a step toward the limousine, a bright light out of the corner of your eye catches your attention." That restaurant is the most popular place to eat in Tickleopolus." the driver tells you as he holds the front passenger side door open for you.
Before closing the passenger door, the driver tells you that you are the last passenger for this tour. When you ask how many other passengers are taking this tour, you are informed that there are 8 others, besides you taking this tour. You turn your head to meet your co-passengers only to be met by a thick glass window. Judging by the fact that you can't hear the 8 other passengers talking to each other, you come to the conclusion that the roomy front portion of the limo, which contains only you and the driver, must be sound proof, which after all the things that have happened to you so far on this vacation, you are not surprised. As you fasten your seatbelt, you notice that it only crosses over your waist, leaving your entire torso free to rock back and forth freely. When the driver enters the limousine, he promptly starts the engine and presses a button with a symbol of a microphone on it and says in a clear and pleasant tone," Good afternoon everyone. I will be your guide during your tour of tickleopolus. During this 30 minute tour I will show you all of the wonderful places that you don't want to miss during your stay in this great city."
He continues," Now, before we begin, I need everyone to please place your arms on the armrests provided for you."
You do as the driver instructed. Once everyone has placed their arms flat on their own armrests, the driver presses a button and immediately your wrist and forearm are restrained by metal restraints.
You are about to panic when the guide informs you that the restraints are only a safety precaution.
You relax, remembering that the seatbelt offers no security for your upper body.
As the guide starts the tour, his first stop is the restaurant that had caught your eye earlier. " This restraint has been owned and operated by the bishop family for generations and is the most popular restaurant in Tickleopolus.
As you sit admiring the quaint restaurant as it passes by, you suddenly feel something graze your bare left side. You look down to see one of the octopuses greenish blue tentacles lightly tickling your left side. You sit there trying to hold back the laughter, as another tentacle emerges and starts lightly tickling your right side. You are trying hard not to laugh now when 2 more tentacles emerge and start mercilessly tickling your exposed nipples. Your nipples are so sensitive that you burst out laughing. As the tickling on your exposed sides increases 2 more tentacles emerge and start drawing circles in your armpits. You are now howling with ticklish laughter. You move desperately trying to avoid the tickling tentacles, but the velvety appendages were attached to your exposed flesh, so that any attempt to avoid them would be useless. After about 5 minutes, the tickling suddenly stops, but the tentacles do not leave your exposed body. You sit there breathing heavily. you were about to complain when you realize that the guide is informing everyone about another attraction. Apparently giving you a break while he explains about the current attraction. You look through the clear glass window behind your seat and see that all of the other passengers are in the same situation as you. Some with feathers, some with mechanical hands, all stand ready to resume where they left off. Only you are not being tickled by any feathers or mechanical hands, but by the guide himself. When your tour guide finishes telling everyone about something that you didn't catch, he continues on to the next attraction. You were about to complain about being mercilessly tickled, when suddenly the tickling of your sensitive nipples, armpits, and now alternating between your ribs and abs continued, You thrash around as much as your restraints allowed laughing uncontrollably until the guide stopped again. Under these conditions you would normally be perspiring, but the cold temperature inside the limo kept your body from perspiring. Like last time, the guide stops tickling you long enough to tell you about the current attraction. This goes on for the entire 30 minutes of the tour. Stopping only a minute or two every 5 minutes or so. One saving grace was that after the last attraction, a museum, you were permitted to rest during your journey back to the hotel.

Feeling well rested and back to your old self, you step out of the limo and take in a deep breathe. The warmth of the sun hitting your bare chest and abs feels so good.Feeling your stomach growl, you realize how hungry you are. You look at your waterproof wristwatch and see that it is 1:30

What do you do?

You walk into the arcade and see rows and rows of different games, very few people seem to be at the arcade but you can see a few in some sort of lounge having drinks and munching on snacks they purchased from a bar-like place in the lounge area.

You walk around the place for a few minutes and wonder how they afford to stay in business with such a low playerbase...

1132112.title: Arcade

choices: You come out swinging and begin easily winning against Jessy
Jessy turns out to be a pro, and the battle quickly turns for the worse
11321121.content:
You take pity on the girl looking all alone and walk over to see if she wants you to play it with her.

"Hey, how are you doing?" you ask. "Fine, i guess, just looking for someone to play this game with... Would you like to?" she replies. You take a look at the machine and it seems to be a fairly regular looking arcade machine with some major differences being that there are 2 booths each with their own seat. On the floor of each are 2 molds, each in the shape of a left and right foot, respectively.

After you look over the machine for a few seconds, you reply, "Sure, i'll play some with you. What's your name?" "Yay!!! Oh, and my name is Jessy, pleased to meetcha!"

You looked over Jessy for a bit and noticed her long black hair and outfit. She was dressed like she was going out clubbing, you began to think she had no clue what she was doing. This theory only proved more probable when she tried to jiggle the joystick to start playing when she hadn't even put her quarter in the machine yet.


You sat down in your booth and put in the quarter, the game's main menu screen read "Final Foot" seemingly as a play off of "Final Fight". You began to question the sanity who would think of such an abysmal name.

Once you put in your quarter it prompted you to remove any foot coverings and place your feet in the molds. You complied and you could feel it squeeze around your feet and then cover them, locking them in place.

Jessy seemed to have caught on by watching you and put her quarter in before being prompted to remove any of her foot coverings and place her feet in the molds as you were. She bent down and unbuckled the 3 buckles on each of her boots, and slipped them off before plopping them on the ground next to her seat, and after she whipped off her socks and placed them in her boots, she placed her feet in the molds.

Expecting to see barren rock, instead you see people, roller coasters, and rides. Instead of the calming quietness of nature you hear laughter and screams.

Towering above you is a giant roller coaster. A sign hangs above you that reads "The Feather Duster" with two feather dusters crossing each other like swords. You also notice that there is no line what so ever. This seals the deal and you run through the line until you get to the station. You walk to the front and jump in. An assistant walks up to you. She instructs you to place your feet in two holes in the front of the car. Then she takes your wrists and secures them to two straps above your head. She takes another two straps and places them over your elbows. Lastly she pulls another belt over your lap. "Oh one more thing" she says as she pulls your shirt, ripping it in half. "This ride is funner if you are shirtless. Oh and you wont need these" she says removing your shoes.

"Wow that man is brave sitting in the front of the car" you overhear one Toon say behind you. "Yea you will never see me up there" you hear another one say. You turn your head to see who was talking but your restraints are too tight and you cant turn your head enough to get a good look. "What are you guys talking about, the ride is all the same right?" you ask the unknown toons. "Not exactly. Are feet are restrained through two holes in the bottom of the car wheres yours is sticking out the front. You get a couple of surprises near the end"

The car starts moving and you figure you will find out what they mean soon enough. The ride starts like any other ride and you start going up a giant hill. You keep going up and up, the cool air rushes past your exposed body and feet, and you realize just how exposed you really are. You reach the top of the hill and start going down.

The first thing you notice is the track is lined with feathers on the way down.
