131221.content:
You hop out of the train and look around. The city is bursting with colorful neons and citizens of all sizes and species. Right in front of you there are two big buildings.
One is an indoors waterpark. You see numerous waterslides coming out of the walls. Right next to the entrance there is a big sign which says "This week only - free entry to all tickle-slides!"
The other building is equally huge, but way less flashy. It doesn't have colorful ads or glowing signs - there's just a piece of paper on the door. You come closer to read it, but the text is too smudged. Below the text is what appears to be a picture of a fox locked in stocks and tickled by multiple anonymous hands.

Which building will you enter?
131221.title: Time to explore!

choices: Just pay and go have fun
1312211.content: You come inside and are greeted by a cute, slightly chubby orca girl sitting behind the reception desk. You can hear roaring laughter through the wall.
1312211.title: The waterpark.

13122111.content:
You ask her what exactly are the tickle-slides.
"Oh, they're like waterslides but with some extra tickly fun! In these things, you're tickled while you slide down."
"Tickled? By what?" - you say.
"Depends! The two most popular tickle-slides of ours have brushes and tentacles, but there are also other options, such as special waterproof feathers. We even have one the inside of which is covered in slippery, but fluffy and soft vibrating material"
13122111.title: Tickle-slides?

131221111.content: You decided to go in. Which slide do you pick?
131221111.title: Go to the waterpark.

1312212.content:
You cautiously enter the building and find yourself in a dark hallway, lit only by a single piece of flickering neon decor. It's quiet, almost as if abandoned, but upon listening more closely you hear muffled, distant voices and footsteps, although you can't tell which direction they're coming from.
Suddenly the silence is interrupted by the sound of a door being slammed shut somewhere in the building. Alarmed, you turn around quickly and see that the entrance is not closed, so you can easily leave this creepy place. However, you're tempted to investigate further and see what's really going on here, even despite the fear.
1312212.title: The other building.

choices: Play along and reach for the bag.
Try to tickle the dog's belly to get him to lower the purse.
Scream as loud as you can for help from the stationmaster.
132.content:
[Note: You mistakenly thought you had arrived in Tickleopolis when you first woke up(last chapter), but it was merely a stopover during the trip there. You watch as a dozen or so fellow travelers join you in the car before the train again heads toward the city. You again fall asleep in your seat on the way, only this nap is much deeper and longer than the last.]

         A hot and smelly breath on your cheek, combined with the trains whistle and the passenger-car's jostling as it slows to a stop all consort to awaken you from a very deep dream. You yawn and stretch, asking no one in particular, "Are we there, yet?". You do a double-take when you discover that you are virtually surrounded by a motley pack of anthro-dogs, of varying sizes and widths, wearing shabby clothes, and staring at you like a piece of meat. Several are literally drooling on the seat next to you! One of them barks, "Hey boys! Looks like "Sleepin' Beauty" is comin' to!" and they all laugh, slapping their knees like it is the funniest joke in the world.

         It's then that you realize that something has gone terribly wrong with your choice of transformations on the vacation package roster. You are horrified to discover that you have morphed into what you had put down as you optimal choice for a tickle date during your vacation - an adorable little anthro-bunny girl! Black strapless bodysuit, white collar(with black bow-tie) and cuffs, and black nylon pantyhose and heels complete the look. You feel your real bunny ears and fuzzy tail and want to scream.

         ("Notgoodnotgoodnotgood -") your mind races and your tiny heart is frantic. You reach for your carry-all bag only to discover it's been replaced by a cute pink purse version. A big paw snatches it up and high away from your reach. "Hey! That's mine! Give it back, you creep!", you muster, though it comes out in such a tiny, cutesy voice, all the dogs begin howling with laughter again.

         "Awww, is this yours, little Bun-Buns?", says the furry mongrel with your purse. He is interrupted by a smallish possum-looking fellow sitting with his rather mole'ish-appearing wife. "Sit! Down, boy!", he stands, commanding in a nebbish voice. Another of the dogs snarls and snaps in the couple's face, "What business is it of yours, pops?", effectively silencing their complaints. The dog with your purse laughs, "Yeah, we're just having alittle fun, old-timer! Right, Bun-Buns?", his big toothy maw now inches away from your little pink nose.

         "L-Look...I j-just want to get use my p-phone to call the travel agency. There's been a mistake! Please!", you beg, sounding too cute in your sweet, tiny voice. Almost reaching the purse by crawling up in the seat, the dog stands up in the aisle of the train car to hold it away from you. Following him, the pack gather around in a circle, all grinning wildly at your perky bunnygirl curves.

         "Hey boys! I know a game for our new playmate", and with that, the dog holding your bag aloft gently-but-firmly steps on the tips of your heels, effectively pinning you, standing, to the floor. Still holding the bag overhead, he grins and says, "If you can reach your purse without using those lovely legs of yours to hop, Bun-Buns, we'll let you go without so much as a nibble. I promi-"
"But Boss!", butts in a smaller, potbellied dogman with short limbs who is quickly cut-off, "Mr. Friskers, I'll handle this! Now sit!", growls the Boss dog, and all of the pack regain their seats on the train. All eyes on you, the dog glares down at you, "Well, what's it gonna be, Bun-Buns? You want yer purse back, don't ya? Just have alittle fun with us while we're stopped here on the outskirts of Tickleopolis".

You decide to:
132.title: Funny Bunny

choices: Your driver, a huge bear-looking woman.
A well-dressed red wolf with cane and cape.
1321.content:
The dog lowers the purse to within easy reach at your eye level, while egging you on, "C'mon, honeybuns! It'll be fun!". You make a grab for it and he yanks it out of reach again, switching hands so that it's even lower. The dogs are all howling and hooting now, and one shouts, "Oh, baby! Give a dog a bone!", causing half of them to fall on the floor laughing.

Meanwhile, you are busy pretending to adjust your skimpy outfit so that nothing pops out when you make a surprise snatch at the purse. You miss again, but lose balance and are now leaning forward, clinging to the crook of his hairy arm. Your round bunny butt pokes out provocatively, sending the dogs into hysterics.

He tickles your soft pink underarms with his other hand, causing you to reflexively giggle and drop your arms to protect yourself. Again, the purse is lowered within seemingly easy reach, and again you try to fake him out, this time by sobbing into his furry belly.

You grab once more and he just keeps laughing, only this time you have hold of the purse-strings, and you're not letting go! "Give...Me...My...Purs-EEEK!", you shriek, not letting go of the purse-strings as feel a cold nose nudging it's way between your nylon-clad bunny buns, just under your fuzzy pink tail. "Hey!", you yelp. Peeking over your shoulder, you see that fugly Mr. Friskers is the culprit. Now he's trying to hump your leg! Since the Boss dog still has your toes pinned, you can't shake him.

The whole time, you've held on to the purse straps, and now it's low enough that you grab the bag with both tiny paws, gripping for all your might as he slowly pulls it upward, his one hand fighting your two for the purse. You strain to pull it down again, but your arms are once again above you, so the Boss begins to lick your face from ear to ear. You scream, "EEEW!" just as you suddenly pop right out of the top of your tiny strapless outfit, giving the dogs quite a show! "GIMME MY PURSE!", you growl cutely, as it appears that sheer pandemonium is about to break out in the train car.

"Alright gentledogs. That'll be enough of that!", comes a deep voice from the door to the car.

It's:
1321.title: Play along and reach for the bag.

13211.content:
Filling the entire aisle with her sheer bulk, the bear menacingly rolls up a newspaper in her mighty paws, as the dogs gently let you down and slink off of the train, amidst various mumblings of, "- just having fun -" and, "- no harm done -". The bear follows the dogs out and you hear her call out, "Last leg to Tickleopolis! All aboard!".

         Glad as you are for that little episode to be safely over, you are angry that you didn't get a chance to stretch outside and maybe purchase some tasty kale or rubarbs to snack on for the last leg. You sit, arms crossed, frowning, as several other passengers climb into the train car, all apparently also headed for Tickleopolis.

          A small group of animal vacationers in college colors alight, as well as a dapper gazelle couple. An otherwise human-appearing couple with zebra and tiger stripes are having an animated discussion, while a massive jolly hippo in ballet garb blunders down the hall past you. You see an old goat with a tall hat dragging some sort of oversized display-case and a beautiful, colorful winged woman with a shawl. Last to embark is a debonair fox clad in an expensive looking topcoat and hat.

         As travelers get settled, the train whistle blows and the powerful engine roars into life. You listen to the excited vacationers discussing their plans for when they arrive in the ultimate tickling party city, and again get excited about your vacation, despite winding up in a form most likely to be tickled rather than be the tickler.

          Interrupting your revelry, one of the following two passengers is forced to sit down next to you, Miss Frowny Bunny, for the last leg of the trip, as the other seats are all taken -
13211.title: Your driver, a huge bear-looking woman.

13212.content:
The bullies all slink away, tails between their legs as the wolf saunters up -

          "My lady-", you interrupt, "I'm A man-", and the wolf butts in, "Amanda is it? A lovely name for a lovely bunny! Tell me, did they hurt you in any way?", he asks, taking your tiny paw in his. "No, they onl-", "Splendid, child!", the wolf again cuts you off, "Miss Amanda, my name is Jimmy Love, owner and operator of the prestigious Wiggle Room in Tickleopolis. I would be honored to dine with you this evening in my private car, if you would so do me the pleasure?".

You politely decide to:
13212.title: A well-dressed red wolf with cane and cape.

choices: Hold you down and gang tickle you.
Tie you up and gang tickle you.
Nip at your clothes with their fangs.
1322.content:
You play along with the gang for a minute, jiggling in place, arms reaching up and out for your purse while the lead dog always just manages to yank it out of reach. The mangy pack are yipping and yelping with delight watching you shimmy around in your skimpy bunny suit.

         "C'mon! Give it back now!", you whine petulantly, pounding the lanky animal's torso in frustration before hitting on another plan. Desperately, you switch tactics and try to tickle the bully on his sides and hips, figuring since you are really ticklish there, he could be, too!

         It gets a laughing reaction from the boss dog alright. He stares down at your feeble pokings and tells you, "Oh, sweetcheeks! We're not on the way to Tickleopolis to be tickled by bunny cuties we're going to tickle `em!", and with that he lets you grab your purse back but still stands on your shoe-tips. He then rapidly tickles you back, causing you to squeal and laugh as you wiggle around in place, unable to move your feet. Now discovering your wicked ticklish hips and sides, the dog causes you to lose balance and topple backwards...right into the arms of the pack.

          You are lifted clear off the floor, furry legs and arms pulled in four different directions by four tight gripping paws, when the first cold, wet nose insinuates itself deep between your nylon-clad bunny-cheeks, causing your eyes to bug out. Flailing for all you're worth, you are held aloft, facing the ceiling while dogs on both sides of you begin licking your bare underarms, sending you into frenzied hysterics. One of the dogs yells, "Who's got the peanut butter!", and they all laugh.

         You suddenly feel strong jaws pulling ravenously at your heels, yanking them off your nylon-clad bunnyfeet and shaking them around in triumph! "So little Miss Bunny wants a taste of tickling the way we do it out here in the boonies? Okay, boys! Let's tickle her Doggy-Style!", yells the leader, and they all start barking and shouting with excitement as they carry you over to one of the bench-like seats and proceed to:
1322.title: Try to tickle the dog's belly to get him to...

13221.content:
The raucous pack carry you over to one of the high-backed bench seats and drape you over it so that your bunny bootie is poking up in the air. Still holding your arms and legs, the whole gang proceeds to lick and nibble at you all over until you are screaming both from the tickling and from being covered head to toe in sticky doggy-slobber. You start to hear zippers and trousers falling to the floor and shut your eyes tight, expecting the worst, when all of a sudden first one dog and then another holding you are sent flying off in all directions.

         You are helped down by a muscular arm and turn to see a massive brown bull with a golden nose-ring. Doffing it's overcoat for you to cover up in, the creature asks you, "Are you alright, Miss-?". You pipe in, "I'm a man actu-" and the beast helps you up, "Amanda, is it? What a lovely name. I hope those ruffians didn't spoil your trip for you. It's not safe these days for a young woman to travel alone. I take it you're going to Tickleopolis?".

         You sit together in a section of the car where the seats face each other, you almost lost in the huge topcoat, the bull across from you, though he is so massive his belly and knees almost touch you. "Name's J.C. Augustus Rasmussin, Miss Amanda, but my friends call me J.C. I'm what you might call a "talent promoter". I have something of an eye for hot prospects and just let me say dear that you have got just the look I've been after. Do you have a place to stay while in town?". "Well no, I-", you begin and he cuts you off again, "Good! Good! Then it's settled. Amanda, I'm going to make you a star in Tickleopolis!".
13221.title: Hold you down and gang tickle you.

choices: A high-pitched whistle blows, sending the dogs running off.
Massive arms start throwing the dogs off of you.
A voice says, "That will be quite enough!".
1323.content:
"SOMEBODY HALP MEEE-", you begin to scream before a grimy paw clasps over your face. All the mutts wince, covering their ears, and the lanky leader says, "Gimme the muzzle, Fido. This bunny wants to play dirty." Promptly, a full face leather muzzle is fitted over your head and pulled taut, silencing you to no more than grunts and moans.

         "Let's see if Bun-Buns is hiding any eggs under that outfit, boys!", and you feel yourself being lifted off the floor bodily, as fangs begin to nip at the heels of your shoes. You yank furiously, trying to free yourself, while hot breath and doggy drool lands on you from the grinning maws circled around on all sides.

         All of a sudden, you hear a 'Ziiip'-sound, and your slinky strapless leotard outfit is pulled down to your knees, leaving you struggling in mid-air, topless, with only your pantyhose covering your bottom. "Get a load of those pups!", laughs one of the mongrels, as you manage a mere, "Mmmmrrrr!" of consternation.

         Next, you feel your high heels yanked off your soft bunny feet, as the two dogs who removed them thrash wildly with their new play toys. Just then, your eyes bug out wide open as you feel a cold nose suddenly insinuate itself in between your soft bunny cheeks, causing you to renew your struggles to no avail.

         "Off with the hose, boys! Let's show Bun-Buns how we do it doggy-style!", and you feel your outfit being torn right off your back, all except for your collar and cuffs. The dogs go nuts seeing your naked body and begin to haul you to the back of the car.

Just then -
1323.title: Scream as loud as you can for help from the sta...

13232.content:
Suddenly, to your amazed relief, dogs are yipping and yelping as they are tossed up and off of you in all directions. The pack slink away with their tales under their legs as you, naked, gaze up from the floor at a massive brown bull with a golden nose-ring.

         Doffing it's overcoat for you to cover up in, the creature asks you, "Are you alright, Miss-?". You pipe in, "I'm a man actu-" and the beast helps you up, "Amanda, is it? What a lovely name. I hope those ruffians didn't spoil your trip for you. It's not safe these days for a young woman to travel alone. I take it you're going to Tickleopolis?".

         You sit together in a section of the car where the seats face each other, you almost lost in the huge topcoat, the bull across from you, though he is so massive his belly and knees almost touch you. "Name's J.C. Augustus Rasmussin, Miss Amanda, but my friends call me J.C. I'm what you might call a "talent promoter". I have something of an eye for hot prospects and just let me say dear that you have got just the look I've been after. Do you have a place to stay while in town?". "Well no, I-", you begin and he cuts you off again, "Good! Good! Then it's settled. Amanda, I'm going to make you a star in Tickleopolis!".
13232.title: Massive arms start throwing the dogs off of you.

133.content:
You are an anthro Kangaroo. You wear a black leather vest, a belt around your waist, and a shark tooth necklace around your neck. You glance out your window and see the the train has arrived at the Silver Feather Station at the heart of Tickleopolis. You step outside with the other passengers and observe all the buildings covered in murals and mosaics of tickling situations. The images both unnerve and excite you, making you anticipate being in a similar situation.

"No wonder they call it Tickleopolis," you mutter to yourself. You then decide that instead of going to your hotel, that you will explore the city. After you step out the station you see three billboards. The first billboard is for some kind of bar or nightclub called "The Naga's Coils." The billboard depicts a Naga squeezing a kangaroo in her coils. She is also holding a feather under his chin. You are shocked to see that the kangaroo disturbingly looks a lot like you. The billboard's caption reads, "If you love a good 'squeeze' stop by at The Naga's Coils. Someone might have a 'crush' on you.'"

The second billboard is for some kind of "clinic" depicting a buxom, cleavage-sporting nurse with her breast pushed up against the chest of another kangaroo that looks suspiciously like you. The nurse also holds a feather in her hand behind the kangaroo's back. The billboard's caption reads, "If you feel ill, come on down to the Candy and Giggles Clinic. We'll take good care of you."

The third billboard advertises some kind of dance hall. It depicts yet another kangaroo that looks like you being hypnotised by an exotic Gypsy belly dancer. She seems to be hypnotising him with a feather. The caption reads, "For exotic excitement, treat yourself to a trip to The Gypsy Fantasy Hall. We never fail to astound and delight the body and mind."

You feel that you just have to visit one of these places, since they have a kangaroo that looks like you on their billboards. Which one will you go to?
133.title: All the Way from the Outback

1332.content:
You decide to go to the Candy and Giggles Clinic. Eventually you find the place; it looks like an ordinary small-town clinic. You slowly enter. The place smells a lot like medicine. But then you are greeted by two nurses. The first nurse looks like the nurse from the billboard and giggles and smiles a lot and has long blonde hair. The second nurse is a brunette, with shorter hair and looks a little more stern.

"Why hello there, Welcome to the Candy and Giggles Clinic," says the first nurse. "I am Nurse Giggles."
"And I am Nurse Candy," says the second nurse. They both seem to speak with British accents.
"So do you have an appointment?" asks Nurse Giggles.

How do you reply?
1332.title: The Candy and Giggles Clinic

13321.content:
Even though you know that you don't have an appointment you can't resist the attractiveness of these two lovely nurses (especially the cleavage-sporting Nurse Giggles) so you lie.

"Yes, I believe I do have an appointment," you say, hoping to win them over with your animal magnetism. They glance at each other and smirk, seemingly knowing that you're lying.

"Well if that's so, come on back with us," says Nurse Candy.
"Oh yes please," shouts Nurse Giggles, running up to you and bouncing her breasts against your chest.

What do you do?
13321.title: A Ticklish Appointment

choices: Nurse Candy decides you've had enough.
133211.content:
"Don't mind if I do," you say allowing yourself to be led by Nurse Giggles further into the clinic. She leads to the check up room, where you see a gurney with all sorts of straps attached to it.

"Lie down, little roo," giggles Nurse Giggles, motioning towards the gurney. Reluctantly you do as she says. As soon as you lie down she begins fastening the straps, two for your arms, two for your legs and tail, one for your neck, one around your chest, and one on your waist. Then she tightents the straps on your chest and waist, a little beyond your comfort level.

"Nurse, that's a little too tight," you try to tell her. She simply giggles again.
"Oh silly roo, there's no such thing as 'too tight,'" she says tightening the chest strap even more. Just then, Nurse Candy entered the room. She had a rather stern look on her face.

"Well, I checked the books, and it seems you don't have an appointment, you naughty boy," she said, with what sounded like mock anger. "I guess Nurse Giggles is going to have to teach you a lesson." Immediately Giggles climbs on top of you, her rump resting on your waist. She grins wickedly and wiggles fingers menacingly towards your stomach. She tickles you from your tummy, to your ribs, and your chin. At first you grit your teeth, trying not to laugh, but eventually she breaks you, and you burst into giggles which slowly turn into laughter. This madness continues until...
133211.title: Tickling in the Clinic

1332112.content:
...you finally pass out from the tickling. While you are unconscious you have a fever dream-like vision of yourself falling through a cityscape much like Tickleopolis. Suddenly a Naga appears and wraps her tail around you, squeezing you tightly. Then the Naga and her tail morph into Nurse Giggles hugging you tightly in her arms, and pressing her ample bosom against your chest. Her bosom is very soft and warm against your chest. Then the Nurse is transformed into a mass of ropes that wrap themselves around you. And then out of the darkness a Gypsy Belly Dancer appears and waves around a glowing prism like feather. You can't take your eyes off the beautiful feather when suddenly she starts tickling your chin, neck, and chest with it. Then the Gypsy Belly Dancer turns into a Mermaid wearing a seashell bra who then seizes you in her arms and plunges you into the ocean, and drags you down deeper and deeprer causing you to feel as though you are drowning. Then slowly but surely everything goes black, and at last you wake up next to a dumpster in a back alley in the middle of the night.

You slowly get to your feet and in what little light there is in the alley you see that someone has performed a costume change on you. Your black leather vest is gone having been replace by two black leather straps that form a crisscross across your chest. On your waist you now are wearing what looks like black leather boxing shorts. On your paws you are wearing black fingerless leather gloves. And finally around your neck is some kind of black leather dog collar. Apart from all the black leather, your new outfit makes you look like a male bondage slave posing as a boxer.

Finally you slowly make your way out of the alley and find yourself in what appears to be Tickleopolis' Red Light District. Across the street from you are two different Red Light establishments. One is a strip club that advertises naga strippers called The Naga's Embrace. You notice that it sounds similar to the night club The Naga's Coils, and think to yourself that both Then Naga's Embrace and The Naga's Coils are owned and operated by the same company. But then you see that the other establishment is a bathhouse (or possibly a brothel) that advertises mermaid courtesans called Mermaid Lagoon.

They both have creatures that are half woman and half something else (snakes for nagas and fish for mermaids) and you feel that you would like to visit one of these places. But then you realize that you have no money and feel downhearted. But then you notice what looks like a wallet lying on the ground right next to you. Instinctively you pick up the wallet and look inside. There is no ID but then you see that are are in fact ten 100 dollar bills inside the wallet with a total of 1000 dollars for you. Now you can afford to visit The Naga's Embrace or Mermaid Lagoon, but the trouble is deciding which one to try.

Finally you decide to visit...
1332112.title: You pass out.

13321121.content:
...the Naga's Embrace. You walk right in and are greeted by a Naga hostess. She smiles at you, while looking at your new outfit.

"Welcome to the Naga's Embrace, little Kangaroo," she says in a sultry voice. "That's a nice outfit you're wearing. If you're not here for a good time, I don't know what you're here for. But if you have enough money, you can go inside and watch the Naga Striptease Show. Or for a little more money you can have a Naga Lapdance which may or may not involve some tickling."

These seem like interesting choices, and finally you decide on...
13321121.title: The Naga's Embrace

13321122.content:
...Mermaid Lagoon. You walk in and see several aquarium-like tanks of sea water that each house one or two mermaid courtesans. Each time you walk by one of their tanks, the mermaids within swim towards the glass to get a better look at you. They all have different colored tails and hair that flows well past their shoulder blades. They all seem to smile at you, and want you to join them in the water.

But then suddenly an octopus tentacle reaches out of the shadows and wraps itself around your waist. Looking towards where it came from you see it belongs to a woman in a red dress that appears to be the Madame of this bathhouse Brothel. You can see she has human arms and pale skin, and the octopus tentacles come from under her dress. She is quite buxom and sports a lot of cleavage. Then she speaks to you.

"Welcome to Mermaid Lagoon, valued customer," she says as she puts you back down and releases her hold on your waist. "Would you like to spend time with a Mermaid, or perhaps spend a little more money to be serviced by two Mermaids?"

You think about this, while looking at some of the Mermaids, as they look back at you with a certain desire in their eyes. Finally you decide...
13321122.title: Mermaid Lagoon

1333.content:
You decide to go to the Gypsy Fantasy Hall. You eventually find the place. Its door looks like the outside to a Gypsy caravan. You enter the place, and find yourself in a dimly lit sort of waiting room where you are greeted by a female receptionist dressed in full gypsy attire.

"Hello and welcome to the Gypsy Fantasy Hall," she says smiling at you and speaking in a Romani accent. "You are just in time for the exotic dance and magic show. But if you would rather meet your own gypsy companion, that can also be arranged. Or (here she gets more seductive) since my shift is almost over, I could join you for a night of fun." With that she steps closer to you, and turns and lightly bumps her hip into your belly.

You think about these tempting offers, and decide...
1333.title: The Gypsy Fantasy Hall

choices: "I will Bind you and Tickle you if you cannot escape in time."
13331.content:
"I think I will watch the show," you say to her.
"As you wish," she says, giving a seductive scratch to your stomach, making you jump a little. "Go on in and find a seat."

You do as she says and enter the showroom which looks like a small old-timey Vaudeville theater. You have some difficulty finding a seat because there is already a bit of a crowd of men and some women. Some of the crowd are humans and others are anthro animals like you. Eventually you find a seat and immediately the show begins.

Exotic Gypsy music plays and the curtain goes up revealing a row of ten Gypsy belly dancer women. They begin their sensual and alluring dance. Deep down you feel that you would like to be up there dancing with them. But then the music picks up, and in a bright flash of light and a puff of smoke another Gypsy dancer appears in the middle of the stage.

"This is our lead dancer and magician, Esmeralda!" a female voice proclaims over a loudspeaker. She has long flowing jet black hair, tan skin, and wears a beautiful red Gypsy styled dress. It does not bare her belly, but it fits her body snugly, and shows off a lot of her cleavage. You cannot help but stare at her as she dances a wild and passionate dance that makes her skirt fly up and reveal her long dancer's legs, while waving a purple a gold-star covered veil around herself, and also playing a tambourine. You definitely feel that you would like to meet her, talk to her, get to know her, and maybe even let her tickle you. After all this is Tickleopolis.

But finally the music dies down, and Esmeralda and the other Dancers stop dancing and take a bow. You and the audience members immediately begin applauding. After the applause dies down, Esmeralda approaches the edge of the stage and begins to talk.

"Welcome, ladies and gentlemen, humans and animals, to the Gypsy Fantasy Hall," she says, and high wonderful and spirited voice. "You are all here to witness our lovely dancing and see us perform mysterious and powerful feats of real magic."

The audience applauds again, and then she raises her hand for silence.

"Now for tonight's Exotic Dance and Magic Show," she continues, "I will require a volunteer from the audience to join me on the stage, to be my lovely assistant for the evening, and if he or she does well that lucky person and I might meet after the show for more intimate business."

You find it hard to believe but it sounds like she might fulfill the thoughts that you were just thinking about her. And now you realize that you have to volunteer no matter what.

"Now which of you out there would love to be my lovely assistant?" she asks. Instinctively you raise your right paw, but then much to your dismay you look around and see that just about every male member of the audience and some female members have raised their hands. You feel downhearted, knowing that there is no possible way that Esmeralda will choose to pick you, yet still you keep your paw up hoping against all hope.

"Hmm tough choices," Esmeralda says to herself. She then closes her eyes and thinks about it. Then after about a minute she opens her eyes, and looks and points directly at...you.

"You, the kangaroo there," she shouts, "come on up here and be my lovely assistant."

You cannot believe it, but there it is, she has chosen you. Briefly you feel the jealous glares of the male members of the audience, but you don't care because she has chosen you. Immediately you get up from your seat and walk right up to the stage. Esmeralda kneels down and offers her hand. You take her hand and let her help you climb up on to the stage. Once you are up there she stands next to you and puts her arm around your shoulders. Then the other Gypsy Dancers form a semicircle around you, facing the audience.

"So tell us, little roo, what is your name?" Esmeralda asks in a polite yet seductive fashion.
"You can call me Joey," you say to her.
"And is this your first time at the Gypsy Fantasy Hall, Joey?" she asks.
"Well, actually it's my first time in Tickeopolis," you say shyly.
"Well then welcome to both Tickleopolis and the Gypsy Fantasy Hall," she says. "But now we must get down to business, and decide what I am going to do with you here tonight."

She holds you closer to her as she speaks, her breast brushing against your arm.

1341122.content:
"Go ahead and tickle me," you say. You worry about being caught in the harem, but the dancers were beautiful and showed no sign of wanting you to leave.

At your response, nearly the entire group breaks out in excited giggles. The one who approached you, a woman with tan skin and flowing black hair, takes your claw in her hand and leads you deeper into the palace. Through a long narrow corridor you walk, led by the black haired woman and followed by what looks to be dozens of other beauties. Looking around, you notice that the passageway is decorated with mosaics. The tiles depict lots of beings, both dragons and humans as well as others, being tickled by the ladies of the harem. The images both scare and excite you, as you anticipate being put in a similar situation.

The hallway emerges into an enormous room covered in mosaics, the size of which makes you gape. The room is as large as a city block at least. In awe, you stumble as the women behind you push you forward.

The mosaics are similar to those you saw in the corridor. The door behind you is the only way in and out, at least for humans. The roof was shaped in a dome with a hole in the center, much like the Pantheon in Rome. All across the roof are mosaics depicting dragons descending through the opening, tickling and being tickled by the women who were waiting for them. The whole palace you've seen so far seems to have a focus on tickling - dragons especially. Though that is not surprising, given where you are (at least the tickling is understandable).

In the center of the room is a large stone table, surrounded by a circle of four smaller ones. Whilst the small tables appear to be regular tables, the one in the middle is shaped exactly like a dragon laying spread eagle. As you got closer, you realized that the table was a perfect fit for you: not an inch to big or small. You glance up at the ceiling again, and notice that all the dragons on it have blue scales. The color, the hues, even the specific tones all match your scales perfectly. Curious, you wonder if your arrival has been predicted.

The raven-haired woman leads you to the center table and gestures at it. "Lay down, great dragon," she says. "And we will give you what you wish." Tentatively, you climb onto the table. You spread your arms and legs like an X and rested them on the perfectly shaped stone. The ladies gasped as you unfurled your wings onto the smooth stone surface of the rest of the table. Because of the shape of the table, you now covered all of it. You were right, it fit your exact shape and form.

The women huddled around you and whispered excitedly. Once again the one with flowing black hair stepped toward you. Turning to face her, you see a sense of barely contained joy dance in her eyes. You look around and see a similar expression in all of the women's faces. In fact, there are a lot of them. A lot. Surrounding you in a circle, there are what look like a few hundred beautiful women staring back at you, each filled with a joyful expression.

You turn to the black haired woman again, who you assumed was their leader. She gestures, and suddenly six women come forward. Before you register what is happening, t each one clamps down a thick iron restraint: one on each wrist, one on each ankle, and one on each wing. With that, the hundreds of women rush in close, as if trying to get a closer view of your restrained form. They stopped mere inches from your body, waiting for their leader to give them permission. You draw your feet away from the source immediately and look up.
An red anthro dragoness stood by your table smiling at you. "Ticklish are we?" She asks giggling "Can i sit down?" Still a little slow from the cold you say "Sure, why not." She sits down "My name is Ria." she says "I'm Drake." you manage to reply. "Are you okay? You look sick." "I'm fine, just not used to the cold, thats all." You reply, lifting your feet few inches off the cold floor. She seemed to notice, for she asked "Would you like me to warm your feet up a bit? Don't worry I won't tickle." She offered still smiling...
13511.title: Unexpected Company

135111.content: "Uh... Why not. I'm freezing anyway." You admit and put your feet in her lap. You utter a sigh of comfort as Ria's warm hands touch your foot. "You must have been really cold!" she exclaimed, starting to rub your right foot with both hands. "Yeah, warmth suites me better." You manage to reply as Ria starts to massage with even more intensity. Her hands slowly fill you with warmth, but you can't help giggling a little when fingers slide over a more sensitive spot. "You must be quite ticklish Softie!" She laughs. "Softie?" You ask. "Your scales are extremely soft. No wonder your so ticklish!" She exclaims and drags a claw up your sole from heel to toe. You instantly curl your toes and jerk your foot back. "He-he-hey! You promised!" You say laughing. "Sorry, got tempted a little." Explained Ria, and gently touching your foot continues to rub your feet. You become ever more relaxed and slowly close your eyes and fall asleep...
135111.title: Why not?

1351111.content:
When you wake up you're still in the dining car but you cant see Ria and the train has stopped, she must have left. You get up from the table. Quickly grabbing your stuff from your cabin you get off the train and exit the station. The air is surprisingly warm, no sign of its earlier frigidity. A huge sign at the station exit catches your attention it reads "Tickleopolis". You take a Brochure from the information desk. You look up the reptilian section and find a hotel that seems perfect, 'the Sensitive Scales Hotel'. The brochure also mentions a "silent" movie theatre, wich also catches your interest.
Where should you go next?
1351111.title: You arrived!

choices: "No thanks, I think i'll check out the city."
13511111.content: You take a cab to the hotel, witch is probably the largest and most luxurious hotel in the city. Since you come from a wealthy family you can afford nearly anything. You go to the hotel recepcion and rent the largest suite on the top floor. After you get your keys the recepcionist asks "Do you wish any entertainment delivered to your suite sir?"
13511111.title: Go to the hotel

choices: "No, I think I'll go with something different."
135111111.content: "Whatever you desire sir. The hotel has special staff of almost any race and gender, all you have to do is ask and state your preferences." The recepcionist explains. "Do you have any eagles in the staff?" You ask, intrigued by the opportunity. "Of course sir! Shall i make the arrangements?"
135111111.title: "What kind of entertainment?"

1351111111.content:
After a few phonecalls the recepcionist says "Your enertainment has been set up in your suite, sir. If we can do anything else for you call roomservice. Have a pleasent evening!"
You take the elavator to the top floor. There is only your suite on the whole level, yours. You open the door and step inside. The suite is huge! You stepped into the living area that was larger than any other you have ever seen. It had its own bar, pool-table, and dance floor. You explore the suite for a while, nothing interesting, but as you open the last door you find your entertainment.
The room is filled with all sorts of tools and equipment, but thats not what caught your eyes. An anthro eagle is laying on a massive table in the middle of the room. He is tied spread eagle with leather straps his huge wings are folded and tied on his back. His beak is tied shut with rope and theres a hood on his head that covers his eyes, preventing him from seeing anything.
With an evil grin on your face you think 'Time to turn the food-chain!'
What do you do next?
1351111111.title: "Please do!"

13511111111.content:
You walk over to the bound eagle. He looks really strong and by instinct you are gatefull that he's restrained. His feet look like a typical birds foot, yellow scaled with three toes facing front and one back, each of the toes end in long sharp talons wich look really dangerous. You look around for something to restrain them with.
After a few moments of searching around you find a few adjustable metal rings with strings on them. You go back and reach for his toes, but at your slightest touch the toes clench and he starts pulling on the straps and tilts his head in an attempt to see. 'This is gonna be a bit harder than I thought.' you think. You wait untill he relaxes again and as his toes slowly open you put the ring on the middle toe on his right foot. At that same moment the eagle starts shaking his foot wildly trying to shake off whatever it was you put on him. Before he could succeed you grab the string and push it through the small metal loop fixed to the table by his ankles, and tie the toe back. After that the other toes are easy to catch and soon his right foot is completely immobilised. You can tell that the eagle is less than pleased with his situation, his body is tense and he is still testing the straps. To mock him even more you reach for his chest, take hold of a long stiff feather and pluck it out. The table creeks as he writhes in his bonds clearly feeling humiliated.
Examining your new tool you pull a chair to the table and sit down facing his feet. You run the tip of the feather in a small circle in the middle of his helpless sole. He thrashes around and you hear a muffled squawk coming from him, but other than that he is completely at your mercy. You continue to stroke his foot with the vane of the feather, running it from his sole, over his long toes stopping at his talons, only to return and stroke his other toes. You see the he has entirely lost it. He's shaking his head wildly and his muffled laugh fills the room.
He is amazingly sensitive and you can see that he hates being tickled. You turn the feather and scribble its quill on his trembling sole. A muffled scream fills the air and you know you found a perceft spot. You've been tormenting him for nearly half an hour now. His feathers are strating to get drenched in sweat, his breathing is faster than ever. If his beak wasn't tied shut he would probbably be begging by now. You leave no stones unturned and saw the feather between his toes wich really seem to give him hell, and he's starting to look tired.
What do you do?
13511111111.title: Tickle him!

13511112.content: You follow the directions to the movie theater. There is a long queue at the entrence but you don't really have anything better to do so you join the small crowd. From overhearing a few others you learn that it has something to do with tickling. You wait your turn and buy a ticket for 'The Laughing Dead' horror movie and to your surprise you get a set of headphones. When you get to your seat you see that everyone is sitting with their feet restrained to the armrests of the seat in front of them. You take your seat, an anthro shark, perhaps a little younger than you is sitting behind you his four-toed webbed feet clamped to you armrests. You put your feet on the seat in front of you and a few seconds later you feel a metal band clamp dow on your ancles. You cant see anyone in front of you so you relax for a moment. Suddenly...

135111121.content:
As soon as the lights go down people start giggling and laughing. You put on the headphone and you discover that you don't hear anything than the dumb advertisements before the movie, no laughing can be heard. You take a moment to inspect the shark feet by your sides. The top of his feet are dark grey while the soles are white, they look extremely smooth and sensitive, given they rarely walked on ground. You put your hads on them as you would on the armrests and lightly tickled the top of his webbed toes. He tried to wiggle his foot away, but you grab his toes and tickle his white arches, raking your claws all over. You can feel the foot shaking slightly, getting tenser after every touch the shark behind you is probably suffering behind you, yet you hear nothing but the movie, thanks to the headphone. You look at the other foot wich is helplessly thrashing and working againtst the bonds and give it a quick tickle. The foot freezes for a second, he knew what was coming, then continued faster then before.
After tickling him a bit more you decide to...
135111121.title: The movie starts

1351111211.content:
Deciding to change your method you start to rub his feet for a little time. His feet still twich at your touch but the moment you start rubbing his foot he appears to relax a bit, you feel his feet becoming less tense than before. As you look to the side you see a tiger thrashing in ticklish pain as the rat sitting in front of him is mercilessly tortures his paws.
The film is about half way through when you launch a tickle attack at the shark's feet, digging you claws into his soles, tormenting every spot, including the webbing between his toes wich prove to be an immensely sensitive spot. As the film comes to an end you give the shark a last quick tickle before the reastraints around his and your ankle release.
The film is over where do you go?
1351111211.title: Changing tactics

13511112112.content:
As the lights turn back up you stand up and look around. Most of the people are leaving, some are still in their seats unconscious. You see the shark still sitting, massaging his feet and panting heavily. You walk over to him and ask "You okay pal? Sorry if i was a little hard on you." He looks up at you smiling and still rubbing his foot and says "Wow!... That was intense. You really know what your doing." "Thanks! Your feet are incredibly sensitive by the way." You remark. "Yeah... The curse of the ocean. My name is Damon." He offered a hand wich you shook and said "I'm Drake" you say. Damon tries to stands but sits down right away laughing and saying "Damn! My feet are still tingling as hell!" You help him stand up. "Sorry but I need to get some water, i'm going back to the hotel. See ya around Drake!" And with that he starts towards the exit.
Where now?

Search for his room on your own

You go to him, blushing a bit. "Hey, I wanted to ask you if you want me to give you a nice massage....as a redemption for the cruel torture earlier that day."

You help him up and you start tieing him up on his bed. There are some ropes and metal rings made for trussing someone up.

As he is laying there, helpless and already exhausted you decide to.....

135111121121212.title: Tickle him to death!!!

After realizing that, you see your toes are a light shade of color that the rest of your fur. When you think of everything you have on your person, you realize that you are Simba.

14222111.content: you tickle her feet more until she laughs hystericly then you...

You suddenly decide it was time to give the poor Yoshi break. At first she just lays flat on her back gasping for breathe. You feel that your limbs have been strapped down to a metal table, but when you look at your body you also notice your body has been turned back into when you were a kid. The Yoshi is grinning at you on the right side.

"This place has a special time device that allows anyone to go younger. Now it's payback time" Yoshi explained.

"You would'nt." Simba smiled nervously.

With that a feather is hovered above your belly.....
142221112.title: stop tickling and start talking

You stop tickling the yoshi and talk to her.

"Who are you?" You ask. She gasps for air and says "My name's Linda. Nice to meet you!" "My name's Simba. Nice to meet you too." You reply as you smile.

"I was just playing with you earlier." She says. "If you like, I can take you back to my house to stay in, free of cost!" "Wow! Really?" You say. "Yeah! I'm having a party with my other friends! You can join to if ya want." She smiles. "Yeah that would be great!" You reply as yo both walk off to her house.

"So what other friends do you have with you?" You ask. "Well, I have some yoshi friends with me. And guess what? You'll be the only boy at this party." She says as she winks. You both finally stop at her house.

Sure enough, you ARE the only guy there. The party is already in full swing; at least 30 tipsy characters in the front room alone. You hear the voice and walk to the door and go inside.
You are in a bedroom and you see a Female koopa that has a lot of clothes everywhere.

"Hi. I'm Belle." The Koopa says. "Um... I was wondering if you could help me out with what to wear for the girls. Please?" "Yeah sure." You reply. "Really?! Thank you!" She hugs you. "Now, can you choose what clothes I should wear?" "Ok. Hmmm..." You think.

You look around at the clothes. You see a light blue shirt that says "Ticklish" on it. You choose that shirt for her. Then you look for bottom clothes. You find leather jeans for her to wear as well. She goes into the closet to get dressed and comes out. "How do I look?" She says. You answer with a thumbs-up sign. "Ok!" She says and goes to the door.

"Wait here for a minute ok? I'll show my friends." You nod as she closes the door. You wait quietly and patiently for her.
1422211212.title: Help for a Koopa

14222112121.content:
She comes in and she looks very happy. "So what'd they say?" You ask. "They said it was awsome!!" She replies happily. "Oh thank you for helping me!!" She hugs you. "I've also come back a present to give you too!" She says as she takes off her shell and clothes. You are stunned by what you see.

She is only wearing a pink bra and panties on her. She goes and lays down on the bed with her arms behind her head. "Go ahead and tickle me." She says as she winks. You slowly move over to her and look over her body. She looks very beautiful without her shell on. You decide where to tickle her.
14222112121.title: A Gift for You

144.content: Of course! Your memory isn't up to snuff anymore when you start forgetting what you are.

After a moment, you turn to the voices behind you.
1441.title: Coon on the train

14411.content:
"My bad. Did we wake you up?" A lazy, golden canine has his feet propped up on the lap of a lop-eared bunny who apparently had just given him a gentle tickling session.

"Nah, I got enough sleep for now."

"Good, 'cause we were just talking about going back to coach" chimes in the bunny. "Isn't that right, Tanner?" With that, he dug his hands into Tanner's plump, three-toed paws.

"Yip!" Tanner recoiled and quickly began pulling his socks on.

"What's back in coach?" you ask.

"You don't know? The reason coach costs so much is that we get to relax. The coach tickets cost next to nothing because they have to ride the whole way in stocks!"
14411.title: Meeting up with friends

144111.content:
"Tanner to get his damn shoes back on" snaps the bunny.

"You're the one that wanted me to take em off in the first place!"

"Excuses, excuses," jives the bunny. Only moments later, the bunny leads you through an ornate red door. You nearly jump for joy at the sight.

At least 30 creatures are in stocks around the walls. Most of them look similar to the three of you: young animals. The majority seems rather comfortable with drinks at their sides and engaged in casual conversation. All are sitting with their backs to the sides and their feet facing the central isle. Hands are unrestrained, but apparently can't reach anwhere. Several have their shoes still on, but several more are socked or totally barefoot. Assumedly, the other 1st class passengers moved onto other cars and several conversations break off when they see you enter.

"Gentlemen," cracks Tanner, "Should we get started?"

"Absolutely!" you and the bunny nearly sing.

A meek looking sqirrel stands directly to your right. Perhaps the others missed him there because his shoes are still on. Watching your eyes fall upon his shoes, an apprehensive smile splashes across his face.
144111.title: Ride of your life

1441111.content:
You crouch down to his shoes, which pull away meekly.

"Awww.. I thought I might actually make it through."

"About damn time!" A cheery, barefoot leopard to his side laughs mockingly at him.

A pair of red and white high tops struggle in front of your face. Each is a little under 9 inches long and 5 inches wide. You torturously start untying the right one while the squirrel whines away. You lift the shoe away by the heel to reveal a snow white sock.
1441111.title: Squirly

14411112.content:
"Oh, come on!" the young squirrel pleads. You slip off his other shoe, and his feet draw together nervously.

"I know you'll like it. Otherwise you shouldn't be going to Tickleopolis."

"Fine.."

His little socked feet droop, disheartened. "Oh, stop being a baby."

Rolling his socks off reveals a pair of four-toed, pink soled feet. No more than size tens with plump little toes.
14411112.title: Taking a look

144111122.content:
You stroke 1 finger over his sole. He jumps. You grin.
You gently draw figure 8's over his sole. You could see he was really struggling this time.
You must be really ticklish you say.
He looks at you hoping for you to stop.
Not a chance.
You start mercillisely tickling him. HE has no chance. He screams in laughter.

A pair of young bunnies sit beyond her; one jokingly whispers "you have to try my bro's feet before the ride's over!"

Both looks at each other and then nods. The voice of the one listen a bit nervous. "We only meant the words as joke." "Yes, we spoke rubbish like rabbits like we are does in boredom...."

You only smiles and your hands reach to each one of the feet, the both feet which are closes to each other. your fingers trail along the soft arches and balls. The bunnies twitch and giggles. "Sir....please...we only took this to save money....." They seems to be feared a bit. Your fingers wiggles a bit more around, cause them to giggle even more and you smiles. "I only entertain you a bit to avoid boredom. Is that so bad?"

The rabbits thinks a bit in giggling and then looks at you. "If you mean it that way, it isn't bad at all...."

Should you....
14411121.title: Bitter-sweet symphony

There is an Fox way in the back and next to him a mouse

There is one particuly eye catching Rat with pink feet

choices: Take a look at the others first.
144112.content:
"What? You've got to be joking." You tell your friends. Is this a dream come true? Or is this just another one of Bunny's practical jokes. Whatever, better to take a once in a lifetime opportunity at this sort of luxury before the train arrives at the station.

Once Tanner had put his socks and shoes back on, you and your buddies stampede back into the coach car behind you. Eyes widen in a loss of words. Bunny was right all along.

There were about 20 some odd creatures sitting comfortably in pairs of stocks. Their feet faced the middle aisle of the train car while purple energy bindings immobilized each person's arms and this made them useless during times of tickle torture.

The different types of creatures ranged in a variety of pokemon, digimon, furries/anthros, and scalies. This included the ocassional human as well. As you walked down the asile, you noticed some interesting choices to choose frome. Two young Pichus and a Pikachu sat next to each other and to pass the time, they made up ryhme songs. A white gatomon sat on the opposite side, blushing adorably when you glanced at her small feet. An Augamon felt a bit nervous and scared when he saw you enter the train car.

There was also a bunny who apparantly was a very heavy sleeper. Two dragons who were much older then the others made attempts to insult each other pathetically and a little human girl in one of the stocks couldn't stop giggling all the time. 144112.title: The Tour Begins

15.content: You look down at your hands.
15.title: Yaaaawwn

152.content:
As you reach up to rub the sleep from your eyes you notice that your hands are covered with velvety smooth white fur. A seamless white that is only broken by the contrast of the ten black claws on the tips of your fingers.
You lazily push yourself up from your seat and head out to find the lavatory so you can wash your face. While you stumble down the cart towards the back of the train you can’t help but notice how sharp your hearing had become. Every sound and voice coming from both the train and the babbling passengers you pass on the way seems annoyingly loud. Your sense of smell is likewise affected, enhanced to a point where you can almost taste the different scents in the air. You try to ignore them, but cant help a slight sigh of relief as you finally reach the lavatory and lock the door behind you.
You turn on the faucet and wash your face with the cool water. It has an immediate positive effect: clearing your mind from the sleepy haze. Stifling a yawn, you shake your head and take a look into the mirror: an arctic fox with ice-blue eyes is staring back at you with white fur that is almost glowing in the dim light. Despite the sleeveless black hoodie and grey pants you are wearing you can tell that you have an athletic body, although you do seem a little shorter than average.
A brief passenger announcement suddenly alerts you that the train is about to stop so you quickly dry yourself with a fistful of paper towels and return to your seat and get your backpack. You can feel your rising excitement about your upcoming vacation fill you up with energy.

The city’s railway station is much bigger than you expected and there are so many signs pointing in every direction it makes your head spin.

Where do you want to go next?
152.title: They are furry

"Possibly a marathoner?" You think to yourself. You glance down at your large feet and wince at the thought of where you are going. "This is going to be fun" you sarcastically think to yourself. You take a look around the cabin and see that you are in......
1531.title: A athlete

15312.content:
Ah that's right you are in coach. "That explains these" you think to yourself looking at the stocks that currently surround your feet. On this train those who can not afford first class are secured in a pair of stocks and those who are lucky enough to be able to afford first class may play and tease the passangers as much as they would like. It is really a win win situation. You get a free ride and the people in first class get some quality entertainment.

You look around and notice that your car is completely empty besides you and a fat looking toon sleeping in the corner. You hear the door to your car slowly open and in walks........
15312.title: Coach

153121.content:
A girl with long, dark red hair wearing the usual jeans and a T-shirt that most people would wear. The girl seems to be enveloped in whatever she is listening to, cause she bumps into a pole and nearly trips on the sleeping toon. She looks around for a few seconds and picks the first seats she saw, coincidentally, the ones where your feet are sticking out of.


She walks over and sits down in the seats where your socked feet are sticking out, seemingly too wrapped up in whatever she is listening to to even notice your predicament. At first you are glad to have some company and are about to speak when you remember something: the whole reason your feet are in the stocks is so they can be tickled, so it might not be a great idea to get her attention. After a few minutes, she shuffles around and bumps your foot, she looks over and sais in an annoyed voice "Hey! Move your feet jerk!" you don't say anything, and after a couple seconds she realizes that your feet are stuck there.

"Hey wait, why are this guys feet in sto-" she is interrupted as she glances at a sign that is at every seating area.

"Coach riders can be tickled with no limit by any first class travelers..." the sign trails off about where to find tickling tools and oils, but the first part is all she really needed to read.

The girl looks away from the sign back to your feet and she...
153121.title: A girl

153122.content:
In walkes a duck with a large.pink bow in her hair. She stands up straight like a human would and you can tell just by looking at her that she is the type of girl who needs to be the center of attention. She looks a little lost and you hear her say "this does not look like the diner car." She walks over to you and looks at you puzzled.

"What on earth are you doing?" The duck asks you.
"Well some of us can't afford first class and have to ride back here as "entertainment" for the first class people" you respond with a hint of annoyance in your tone.
"Entertainment? That sounds fun!" She squeals. She gets a devious look in her eye.
"Please will you just leave me alone?" You ask the duck
"Well........"
153122.title: A bird

1531221.content:
"I don't think so! If I let everyone off the hook than first class would be no better than coach. And its not fair that I had to pay a lot more for my ticket than you did for yours." They duck whines "Yea there is no difference besides the high quality seats, gourmet meals, the fact that you're not locked up, the...." you are cut off as the duck, who clearly looks mad at the fact that you are arguing with her, started quickly moving her feathery wing up and down your foot. You bite your lip, trying to hide the fact that your feet are insanely ticklish, however you do a bad job as a grin starts appearing on your face.

"Oh and besides, you are not even ticklish right?" she teases as she continues to torment your foot. She starts using her other hand to tickle your other foot and you start going crazy! You bite your lip harder as the tickling gets worse. Your grin gets larger and small giggles start to escape your mouth. She slides one of her wings through the gap in your toes and that is the last straw.

"NO!!! hahahahah STAHAHAHAP IT HAHAHAHAA PLEHEHEHEHEHEEHS!" you scream out in ticklish laughter. The duck, clearly having a blast, just smile at you wickedly and starts doing that with your other foot also. Your laughter increases an octave, shattering the windows on the train. The duck, completely unfazed by the fact that there is glass exploding everywhere, continues her torment. Eventually the train comes to a halt and through your tear soaked eyes you see the duck get up and walk away.

Almost like magic the stocks spring open and you get up and walk out of the train car. You are now standing in a train station. You exit the station and head to the town.
1531221.title: It's only fair

15312212.content: Feeling that this is a great time to test out your new athletic body you pass the cab stand and head down the street at a quick jogging pace. You are amazed at how easy this feels. You are not out of breath, your muscles feel fine, and you feel like you could do this forever. After a couple of minutes running you come to a fork in the road. On your left is a dirt path that leads into a thick jungle, and the other way is a paved road leading into town. You stop for a moment and contemplate your options.
15312212.title: Walk down the street

1531222.content:
Before she has time to answer a woman in a fedora comes running in, followed closely by a man holding a camera. She looks around and spots you and the duck. She smiles and walks up to the duck.

"Hello my name is Rita the report." The woman says. "Hello my name is Daisy" the duck responds. You don't introduce yourself, still a little annoyed that you are locked up like this. They don't seem to care at all and just talk like you are not here. "Were you going to torment this young man?" The reporter ask daisy. Daisy looks at you with sad eyes and responds "I don't think so. I feel kinda sorry for him"

"That is to bad. Im trying to get some good footage for the news and this would have been great! You could have been a star!" The reporter says sounding dissapointed. Daisy eyes turn to stars and it looks like she is daydreaming. She snaps out of her trance and says "you did not let me finish. I feel sorry for him because of what I'm going to do to him! "

"Great! The reporter responds "start when ever you are ready"

Daisy looks over you with determination in her eyes and......
1531222.title: A news crew runs in

choices: The reporter thanks Daisy and leave. But Daisy notice your "tree" growing up
Daisy notice your erection and really want to be a star
15312221.content:
She begun with a finger on your left foot.
The feeling of Daisy's feather make you smile as a dumb, trying to contain your laugh.
"Hmm, said the reporter, that seems that it don't working"
"He he, laugh Daisy, It's just because I was started. I'm gonna drive him crazy for sure" she said as she look at you determined.
As she said this, she use all of her fingers against your soles. Your laugh explode as well.
"HAHAHAHAHNO-HAHAHAHA-STOOOOOOP-HAHAHAHA-YOUHAHAHAHA!!!! " you trying to stop her but she keep her tickle torture.
"Oww, I'm will be a star thanks to your ticklishness " she said seductively as she give you a wink.
"Whoah, exclaim the reporter, you're such a really good tickler Daisy"
"Oh sure I am. Kootchie kootchie koooo! "
"HAHAHAHAPLEAAAAAHAHAHASE ! STO-HOHOHOHAHAHAHAHAHA!! "
But Daisy seems to ignore your implorement.
As she is tickling your feet , you fell like someone is getting bigger in your pants.
"Oh no, they don't have to notice that" you think while you are crying of laugh due to Daisy's fingers.
15312221.title: Tickles your feet

155.content: That certainly narrows it down. You then look down at your feet...
155.title: Gloved

choices: You shoot fire out of your hands
1552.content: Like your hands, your feet are completely covered. You walk over to the mirror hanging on the side of the train car and take a look. Looking back at you is the reflection of a superhero. You sit there for a moment admiring yourself in the mirror when a thought comes to your mind. "Wait I be I have super powers" You try and use your powers when.......
1552.title: they are wearing boots

choices: "Ooh, maybe you're a ghost and you're still asleep, how scary"
15523.content:
No hands. No feet. No powers. That means...
"Oh god!" you cry out loud. "I don't exist!
What if I'm just an undefined character in some lame fetish fic!"

"Can you turn it down" a cute catgirl sticks her head through the cabin door.
Looking at your confused expression she says "Yeah welcome back dork, you've been having some weird dream and screaming in your sleep for the past half hour. Are you finally back to your senses? Then maybe I get get some sleep myself."

"W-what do I look like to you?"

She scratches her ear, annoyed and bemused.

"Still dizzy eh. Well from where I'm standing you look like you're obviously a..."
15523.title: It is unclear

choices: Ask if she wants to explore the town together, as partners/friends
Ask if she wants to meet up for some sessions later
Say your goodbyes and explore your other options
155233.content:
You tilt your head to your shoulder and grin, still feeling tired but also a bit silly. But your guest doesn't move andyou realize she wants to see if you'll return the flirt.

"You're awfully cheeky for someone who..." You stop.
"Who's what."
"Who's travelling to a town where cheekiness will get punished by tickles" you mumble.

Her jaw drops for a second and you see the desire in her eyes, struggling to respond, but then she picks the composed act as she flipsher hair back.
"Well- I certainly hope so. I haven't just travelled a thousand miles just to be scolded instead of being punished for my misconduct, preferably by several 'lers." And now it's your turn for your jaw to drop.

"I'm sorry, you came this fa to GET tickled?"

She shoots and annoyed-bemused glare at you again.
"What did you assume people come to a place called Tickleopolis for?"

"Maybe you took a wrong turn at Albuquerque" you tease.

"Okay, that's IT. I think you've just earned yourself some tickling."
and she jumps at you and digs into your underarms.
"Ha-ha-ha, you too" you try to defend your pits and belly and tickle back. You slap around too much to be very effective but you do manage to dish out a few leg pokes side squeezes, enough to make her back off.
But after a moment of surprise, she grins and redoubles her attack. You laugh and scream loud and defend yourself best you can.

She collapses onto the seat next to you, panting, then turns your head towards you and grin.
"So, Tickleopolis everything you hoped for so far?"

You'll say, can't believe that you've struck gold and found such a flirty little minx, and you haven't even fully arrived yet. This town really could be all that you had hoped for.
155233.title: "Ooh, what if you're a ghost, how scary."

info.brief_description: A weekend vacation in the tickle city goes... wrong?
info.description:
After saving up for a month, you decide to take a vacation to the Tickling Vacation capitol of the world, Tickleopolis. What you are, who you'll meet, and what you'll do is entirely open ended (although I have a feeling it will involve tickling!) Feel free to include any cameos (cartoons, mainly) that you wish.


I decided to make this story 18+ so you can get away with a little more... lewdness, if you want. That being said, don't expect everything in here to push the limits. Most of it probably won't be too much more out there than Bing's Tickle Mansion (http://www2.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1036613 ) .
